lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello, everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around playing Dungeons and Dragons and say inappropriate things before the camera starts.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Every time!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyway, we have back in person our illustrious rogue, Vax'ildan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Welcome back, baby!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Happy to have you back. Let's get through our announcements quickly so we can hop into the game, because we have a lot to discuss. A lot of things to see. A lot of places to go. First and foremost, if we can give an awesome shout-out to our sponsor Loot Crate. Once again been awesome to the show. Once again, they have their theme this month. Sam, did you want to say a thing or two?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's an odd theme. It's all shirts that I've worn. No, the theme this month for Loot Crate is the anti-hero. That's part of the Loot Crate theme and the Loot Wear theme. Not just the box, but the bag as well. But you know what I love?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: What do you love, Sam?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I love toys. I love socks. I love shirts. I love posters. I love collectibles. I love pins. I love boxes. And I love deals. And you can get all of those things in combination if you get a subscription to Loot Crate. If you use lootcrate.com/-- that's a forward slash-- CriticalRole, you will be instantly shown a showcase of all the Loot Crate offerings. And you'll get three, not one, not two, a little less than four, but $3 off a monthly subscription.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's just the first month. It's just $3 off the very first month.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But let's be real, it's still pretty good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where'd you get that great t-shirt you're wearing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why did you have those notes with you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: $3 off the first month is great, though. It's still great. It's still a good intro. It's essentially like getting-- I don't know, I'm done.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's $3 just for writing a word.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It gets you in, and when you're in, you don't want to get out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And they got really good stuff. You got your t-shirt from Loot Crate, Voltron.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! I'm wearing a Loot Crate t-shirt right now. It fits. It makes me look strong and handsome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's true. It's true. If that $3 can buy you a six-inch sandwich at an undisclosed location where sandwiches can be constructed, purchased by artisans.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you so much, Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, I did really good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Taliesin, you're handling it next week.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll be in the middle of the desert. However, the rest of the crew here will be playing a one-shot game, dungeon mastered by our wonderful, recently proven skilled dungeon master here, Liam O'Brien.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm all growed up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Somehow in the canon world of Exandria. So we'll see how that plays out for you guys. I'm really excited to see what you pull together, man.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have something very delightful planned.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that'll be fun. So look forward to that in a couple of weeks. We'll be thinking of you guys while we're not here, but watch this guy be evil. It's going to be great. Anything else anyone wants to discuss?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would like to announce that I am so goddamn happy to be back in this room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! Back in the pilot chair.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait a second, pilot chair?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just don't think about it too much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Can I also point out today that the official World of Warcraft Twitter made a Critical Role joke?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that true?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this? That made me happy. So let's dive in to tonight's episode of chaos and heroic whim.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's going to happen?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back. Last we left off, Vox Machina, in their search for the Vestiges of Divergence to gain artifacts powerful enough to rival, hopefully, the power of the Chroma Conclave, a group of chromatic dragons that have been terrorizing the countryside of Tal'Dorei. The party has just finished their journey through the Feywild, a strange, magically overgrown realm of fey creatures, illusion, and apparently, corrupt tree-bros. After a fight with this long-mentally disturbed fey, heartbroken and driven to vengeance and soiling the land around him, you defeated him and took from him the bow, Fenthras, which you've been seeking. Your Vestige, Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right. That's right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You then gathered hands and through the magical capabilities of Keyleth, the druid of the Air Ashari, you managed to Plane Shift the rest of the party back to Whitestone itself. Speaking of which--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Already? Already?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How long have we been gone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, and I also need Scanlan, Percy, and Grog to roll wisdom saving throws.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What did we do to deserve that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We all deserve it. We know we do. That was terrible. I have a thing called Resolve and I have one usage of it left. May I use it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get to reroll a saving throw? Yeah, you may.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would this be magic, Matt?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's double.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Goddamn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a magical effect.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're in trouble.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If it's not magic, then I have an 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Guys, drama needs conflict.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hot damn!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so excited.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks like there's a darker rainstorm coming, probably in the next half-day or so, off in the distant northwest, and there are now townspeople looking about at the group of you guys. Keyleth, Scanlan, Vex, and Vax: returning, your mind feels a little fuzzy, but overall nothing seems to have affected you. You're glad to be back. Percy and Grog, you are very confused how you got here and not quite sure why nothing has happened since you gathered here as friends. Yes?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So do we have a straight piece of missing time? Are we still waiting to go to the Feywild?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As far as you guys know right now, you guys are still waiting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, I'm ready to go!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How long does this spell take?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, do we have to wait long, because I have the pee. You know? Where you're like hide-and-go-seek pee?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I did, but I feel fine now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ready to go to the actual castle?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Feywild.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Keyleth just brought us back. We're back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're back from the Feywild.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're a terrible liar. (laughs)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's true, but it's irrelevant. What the fuck are you talking about?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What are you talking about?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does the name Garmelie ring a bell?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If he doesn't remember we went, does that mean I lose my title?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe you can work it out?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You titled Vex'ahlia.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I did what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You gave Vex'ahlia a title in your Whitestone kingdom. She was the Duchess of some hut.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can someone who can't successfully lie to me please explain to me what's going on?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Baroness. Lady Vex'ahlia, Baroness of the Third House of Whitestone, Grand Mistress of the Grey Hunt.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How do you know about the Grey Hunt?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know anything about the Grey Hunt, but it's written down on a piece of paper you gave me, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it written on a piece of paper?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It is written on a piece of paper.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That I actually threw out because I fixed up my notes. So I don't have the piece of paper in this world binder.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What a dicklord. You did not throw out the paper.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Someone wrote it down, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You piece of shit. Why did you throw it away? What a fucking--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is how I know you're lying, because if I had written that down, you wouldn't have thrown it away. That's ridiculous.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no, it's definitely right here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you certain you're not trying to do comedy right now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel funny. I don't know-- for the sake of actual sanity, does she actually have the piece of paper that he wrote down?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did he write something down?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I did, I wrote it down for her and handed to her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He did, and it's just, it's in my-- so I don't have it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would've had it with you. You would've definitely had it with you. And yeah, she does.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I would still have it. It's just not in this particular not-in-that-world binder.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not in this realm.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The binder that Vex carries is much, much better.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's got like fur. And some like--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keeps it under her arm the whole time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There are more worlds than these.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's got a happy kitten on it that says "hang in there."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It says life-- (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Life needs things to live?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know what's so funny about that either. I don't remember any of that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It grows on you so quickly, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Show him the paper, Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's your handwriting, don't you see it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We were committing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why? What hap--? What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We were in Syngorn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, I think I can help. I'm going to cast Modify Memory on Percy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And Grog's just content sitting over here completely blank.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eating chicken that he found on the road.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is so exciting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Little gamey?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've never seen him laugh like that before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can help you remember, Percy. Just look into my eyes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't want to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, that's getting giffed. Okay, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But wait, are you just going to make up what he remembers? No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy, I need you to make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, and I'm out of Resolve.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What is your spell DC? Is this with the cone? Scanlan, is this with the cone?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With the cone. I want this to work.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're going to pull-- screaming in his face.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow, eight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What the fuck?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, how do you modify his memory? Because at this level you can alter the memories of an event that took up to seven days ago.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What level are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Level seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you can only modify ten minutes of it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Speaking as Liam, remember that this is a man who gave an evil sword-- he gave crystal meth to Grog.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The best crystal meth! The finest crystal meth in Christendom.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can change any memory. Ah, what was it called?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ten minutes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What was your title called? There's nothing on this piece of paper! (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Inception.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lady Vex'ahlia. Baroness of the Third House of Whitestone and the Grand Mistress of the Grey Hunt.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus Christ. Baroness of what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of the Third House of Whitestone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And Grand Mistress of the Grey Hunt.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have no patience for any of this shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whitestone and Grand Mistress of the Grey Hunt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of all the ten minutes to have him remember, maybe that's not the one to focus on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not remembering. He's going to be making it up. I'm not actually going to remember it, he's going to lie.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Make up something wonderful for him. He's wanted to go there his entire life. Make something magical.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You don't have time to have this conversation. This is happening right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This isn't happening. Fuck with me. I'm so excited.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god. When did we leave? How many days has it been?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's been close to a week in the Feywild total, all the nights you've rested.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can only modify ten minutes of time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I can't build the whole story up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he'll remember ten minutes that you plug in right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And by remember meaning whatever you explain.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And remember, as truth, whatever ten minutes he hands out. This spell is one of my favorite spells in the game.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is amazing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I don't know. I'm going to make him remember that we landed in the Feywild together as a group. It was a beautiful field filled with naked nymphs and fey creatures that all came to him and gave him a wonderful full-body massage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Very uncomfortable, all right. But no, that was tension. Okay, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She agreed to keep his secret and he had a wonderful time before his memory fades.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my. Wait, that was-- we were-- but there was-- you shouldn't, no! Yes! I did do this. Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You remember?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do, and we will never discuss why again, but yes, I did do this, and I'm so glad I wrote it down correctly because that was very embarrassing. I'll have this approved.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Approved?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, well, I'm going to make sure I have to-- of course inform-- Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who's yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It seems the awkward curse of the Feywild has set into a couple of your allies.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I, apparently, am missing an awful lot of time. But this did happen. Yes, okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, Percival, look at this. Show him the bow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that kind of bow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Grog, it's really badass. You killed the guy that was holding it. You.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Me? So it's mine?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I pull out the piece of the petrified crocodile. We killed this, too. This is all that's left of him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? Those are like amazing things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, is this normal? Would we have known that this is normal for people to lose their memory when they come out of the fucking Feywild?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you would have no idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We wouldn't have learned any of that in our studies. No?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your studies aren't extensive on the Feywild, and the people that may know, partially, are suffering from the circumstance.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's a petrified crocodile. What else did you see while we were in this magical place?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To be honest, my memory is foggy as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, a little bit. But you guys weren't heavy studiers. You weren't the most studious children.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) I was a studious child.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For certain things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was a very studious child. He cheated off my tests all the time. I was incredibly studious.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Now that I've been there, we can go back at any time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Really? You promise?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog, did this happen last time you went to the Feywild?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When you-- do you remember-- okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I really don't think we need to worry about Grog so much. I think he's fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You killed so many things, Grog. You fought so many people.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh god! Did we get alcohol? Did someone give us alcohol?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Damn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But that can happen today.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, but it won't be fairy alcohol, but I know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we've been, naturally, without alcohol.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to find Pike. Pike came to help us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How long have we been gone for?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike was there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Five days?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know, it's a bit foggy, but a few days.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Guys, let's just go find a wizard and some alcohol, in whichever order.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to go file this and I'll meet you in a moment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Allura? Maybe she can help.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Here. I'm going to make sure that that's finalized with the correct spelling.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jabba the Hutt. Not that grand to me. I start walking off towards the castle.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're in Whitestone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're in Whitestone, currently, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, let's go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We just left there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just eat your pigeon and come along, Grog.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Strange. Suddenly, I am hungry. Are you suddenly hungry?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We should eat something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I make sure Trinket's out of the necklace.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, I could use a glass of wine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I could use a carafe of wine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket licks the side of your face. Nuzzles you as you walk towards the castle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, if you got a bow, and there were pixies, and you gave her something, did I get anything? Did I pick up any diseases?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lots of diseases.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You fought bravely. And often. You wielded your weapon strongly and proudly, and had many definite physical encounters, and were never frozen. And showed your power and defended us to the best of your ability.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You waded through blood, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I insight check Scanlan?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) You can. Scanlan, make a deception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Six!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Holy Jesus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But even just them speaking of it is almost half of the fun, so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's pretty great. I like all those things you said.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You were great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did I get any new weapons? I won't be able to pull it out of the bag of holding unless I know what's in there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to check my pockets for anything interesting.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't have pockets.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percy, your sketchbook.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My sketchbook, yes, what about it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You made sketches the entire time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god! I did!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you look through the pages and there are sketches you don't remember drawing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh fuck! I mean, oh fuck!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is so weird.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You had a lovely time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This'll do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can go back. We'll take a lovely vacation.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, no, this and liquor will do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You used your lightning javelin. You--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys approach--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes! You have a little statue. You have a little statue, Grog.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that's right. A little statue of a dog that might be magical.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A little statue of a dog.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: An onyx statue of a dog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I reach into the bag of holding for an onyx statue of a dog?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intelligence check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've seen it, I can reach in there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of you guys can reach in there and get it if you want to. I just want to see if he can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, your lack of imagination is finding it difficult based on the words you were given to formulate enough of a solid creative thought.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's black. Onyx means black.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Honest statue of a hog. It's an honest statue of a hog.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Doesn't know what onyx is. He's picturing--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He barely knows what a dog is at this point.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you want to reach in here and reach in my bag. Oh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sam, you can do this to me too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And there you have it. The onyx mastiff is there before you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's an onyx mastiff. It's an onyx statuette of mastiff. If you use an action to speak the command word--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Which we don't know--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know. And throw the figurine to a point on the ground within 60 feet of you it becomes a living mastiff for up to six hours.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought the guy told us we'd have to figure it out. Did he whisper anything to you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was etched on the bottom and I totally understand it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, you read Elvish?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're partially elvish.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's right there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So wait, it's insta-dog?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's insta-dog.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then what does it do? Can it fight?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It bites and it claws just like-- oh, no. It just bites.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And what happens if it gets killed?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm looking, I'm looking.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It has an intelligence of eight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's your intelligence?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my goodness.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It reverts to a figurine early if it drops to zero hit points or if you use an action to speak the command word again while touching it. When the creature becomes a figurine again, its property can't be used again for, ugh, seven days.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Get to the bottom part, come on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mastiff has an intelligence of eight (laughs) and can speak Common. It's smarter than you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, it's a talking dog?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I wonder if it has a name.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It can also see invisibility.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It can see invisibility?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's why it's a good guard dog if you--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And objects within that range.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I like this dog.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The only important thing on that paper.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And how long does he last? He just lives until he's done?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Six hours.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry, I didn't mean to read all that and make it not interesting.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you set camp though, good sentry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But we need to know the magic word.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We know it. It's good doggie.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, we know the word already?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's part of the enchantment, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good doggie.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you teach us how to say that in Elvish?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't teach him how to say it in Elvish.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can say it in Common. He understands Common.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He understands Common, that's fair.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vel'ena. Vo'el'ena.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vo'el'el'ena?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that's it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vo'el'la'la'la.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, we start walking back to Whitestone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog, I'm sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's get the dog out here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's hold off on the dog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys make your way towards the castle, there's a small group of figures. You see three armored Whitestone soldiers with one figure following them. Different outfit, looks to be simple dark blues and grays. Dark skin, short dark hair, carrying his crossbow at his side. As you make eyes, you immediately recognize this as Jarett.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jarett!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jarett is coming down and he sees. "Aye, friends, it has been a while. I'm so happy to see "that you survived. It's been a while. Is everyone okay?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How long?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Aye, most better part of a week."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So it is like Saturday here, right? Time runs the same?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So it wasn't yesterday?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why did you taste the wind?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know why. It's a strange question." (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It tastes like Saturday, certainly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "More confused by the question, but it's fine. All right."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How are things here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, (sighs) let's just say better for the time being." And as you look up, what you didn't notice before when you saw the clouds is there's this slight light blue hue to the entire sky.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Excellent.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's this very faint shimmer to it. And he goes, "Ah, the barrier is now up, which is "good. As soon as they finished that, Allura, Drake and Kima all left to find information on the green dragon."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I did not inquire as to the location, but they said they should be back in the next few days."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cassandra might know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She will.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: When did they leave?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's three days ago? They were hoping to get insight on Thordak's current situation while "we amass as many armored folks here as possible and continue to reach out for allies. I think that "is the main goal right now, is to find as many allies as we can. It was interesting to put a "stake into this fight."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So you're leading an army?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, we're building whoever we can in this vicinity. There's not many. At the very least, "defend, in case this ends up falling."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And what's your role in it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back. Slight little technical issue there. We're going to roll back in. Little bit of information, step into the moment. As Jarett has walked down the steps of Whitestone and began a conversation with Vox Machina about the current situation here, he says how, "Currently, Allura, "Kima, and Drake are off trying to find information on the green dragon, Raishan, and trying to "discover what best can be done regarding the attack on Thordak in Emon. Here, I am doing the "best I can to build what armed forces we have at our disposal, and we're trying to reach out to "bring whatever allies are willing to put their stakes into this battle. But yes, this is a "monumental task based on my own experience, and I'm doing the best I can. But bear with me, it's--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have faith in you, Jarett.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you, I'm glad somebody does. Asum actually just arrived here. About two or three "hours ago."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. We were wondering what happened to him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Haven't seen him in a while.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As were we. Last we heard from Gilmore that he disappeared with Tofor within Emon after the attack."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shaun's still in the city?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Shaun is still in the city. I believe he's actually up meeting with Asum and Cassandra right "now in the castle."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's clean up and head in that direction, I'd imagine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Certainly. Well, if you need me, I'll be around. Just--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jarett?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Has there been any eyes on the green dragon here recently?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "None of us have seen the dragon. None of us know its whereabouts, and attempts to scry have "been balked. I do not know."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's all right. I believe there is information on the whereabouts of the white."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we know where?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I do not know. That is more for what they hold at the castle."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yell loudly if you need me."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It warms my heart to see you all safe."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Same.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you approach the outside of the doors, they're partially ajar; on the inside you can see your sister, Cassandra, sitting at a table. Gilmore is leaned back, arms crossed, tugging on the end of his chin goatee, and you see Seeker Asum currently facing towards Cassandra. They're in mid-conversation right now. As soon as you enter the room: "It is good to know that you all "survive, as they've told me."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Same to you, Asum.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he turns and looks towards you, you can see the side of his face that has all the heavy tattoos now bears heavy acid scars that have blended the tattoos into the scarring. It's not a very pretty sight, but he seems to at least be in one piece right now. He still has his thick, hooded cloak around his shoulders, and where normally he has a shaved head, some of the hair is growing in in areas that can grow hair based on the damage to this side of his face.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What happened to you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This-- I'll take this."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm so sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's fine. I've had worse. Trust me. Come, sit." Cassandra sits up. "My brother." She comes up and gives you a big hug and holds you for a second.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pardon our appearance. And stench.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we smell?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're covered in that black messiness, I assume.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I hadn't even noticed, actually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do. And it is. Its scent has faded a bit, but you all still are not in the most presentable means. However, the conversation's dire tone seems to be enough where no one pays much mind to it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We were successful. I will let the others fill you in with some details, although I do-- and I'm going to double check, and I'm going to find the brief letter explaining what I've set up with Vex, although it will not have any of the reason why, but it will have at least the nature of what's been done. And we have acquired, well, Vex. Vex'ahlia, if you would.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Another Vestige.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gilmore leans forward. "Very good."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I would love for you to take a look at it, Shaun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I would love to have a look at it." He takes it. As you hand it to him, it actually curls around the back of his hands and whips back into a strong, tensile stance, and he-- "That's weird." He takes it and starts looking over it as Cassandra looks back. "I'm glad you're all safe, "and apparently named. Welcome to Whitestone, Lady Vex'ahlia."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She takes it, folds it. "I'll have this put in the books immediately."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I appreciate your kind generosity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will request more information soon."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll see, yes. That might be complicated, but yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's more dangerous than an intelligent dragon "than one who's crazy? I've been keeping an eye as best as I can. Thordak gives direct orders to his "wyvern guard often, some off to communicate, I presume, with the other members of the Conclave; I "know not. I've been stuck within the city. Most survivors stay indoors. I've been working with the "Clasp, believe it or not, to shepherd over a thousand people below the city streets for "protection. The lesser of two evils, to be sure, but at the very least, at the moment they have "nothing to gain by working against us at this juncture. Naught but six hours ago, the Cinder King "was roaring in anger, his cries echoing through the streets. The people fell to their knees, "thinking this was the end. Stepped up from his volcanic throne, and sent the majority of his army "eastward. I used this distraction to slip into the now-unguarded Lyceum, find a port scroll and a "sigil for Whitestone before they returned. Came here to see all of you alive, so that's the best "news I've had in weeks. That's the best I have to bring you about the current state of the city."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's our home.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's our home."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What is eastward?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Kymal. Westruun. Technically, here."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you bring any other survivors with you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're trying to get as many below ground as "possible, and out of harm's way."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And Greyskull Keep?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I haven't seen it. I've been within the city walls."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you say Thordak's wife? Did I mishear you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wyvern guard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wyvern. I heard wife.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wife and guards is what I heard, and I was so fucking confused.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, his wyvern guard is often...?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He sent a majority.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't know why.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Eastward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's all I've seen."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We need to find out where they're going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I had to use that time to get to the Lyceum. Usually it's too heavily guarded."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, of course. Just making a list.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You've done so much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've done so little. There's more to be done. But the more time that passes, whatever it "is they're planning, I'm sure is getting closer to fruition."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we have any known whereabouts on the white or the green dragon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hopefully. But anyway, I've been putting the rest of my energies towards trying to procure this "information. The green, Raishan, as I believe you've told me, eludes my watch, my gaze. There is "a lot of protection around that one. I get the sense that of those in the Conclave, she is "probably the most trained in my arts."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's the one that released Thordak, so that wouldn't surprise me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's on my shit list.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think she's on a lot of people's shit lists. Mine as well. The white, however. I know "not its name, but I was able to look towards it. I was able to find it sitting amongst a large pile "of rock and rubble. Looks like a fallen city, crumbled and destroyed. From what I saw, there "were smoldering ruins, toppled landscapes of buildings and temples, arcane crystals crashed and "cracked, deep inside a ravine. There, the white dragon perched, setting up this slow-rolling "winter amongst a shivering horde of dragonborn."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What did he just say? What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shivering horde of dragonborn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Amongst a horde of dragonborn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Draconia?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What remains of it."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That was days ago."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a card we no longer have.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I need to be careful when doing this."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The city was razed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "From what I could see, yes."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you see any motion? Any slaves?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, yes. There were many survivors, but they were not in the best of states."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This white dragon, does he bring weather, or any sort of change? It's all ice and snow, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The very essence of each ancient wyrm, if you will, carries with it its own element. It "slowly transforms the landscape around where it takes up its new den. If it seems to sit atop the "remains of the once-proud Draconia, then it now falls under the icy grasp of the beast."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And the will of the people there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I could not look that deep. My apologies."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is this just with a simple Scrying spell? Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We must be careful. We cannot let Whitestone be discovered.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, and as we've learned before, Scrying can alert your position.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point in time, you guys hear heavy footsteps heading up from the lower floor of the castle. You hear two voices shout out, "Lady Cassandra! Lady Cassandra!" They enter the room real fast. You see one man, probably in his mid-20s or so, sweat pouring down his face, his eyes wide. "My lady." At that point you hear, echoing outside of the castle, this loud, piercing, shrieking roar.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (roar)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit balls motherfucker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's distant, but even at that distance, it is loud.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gilmore, does the screen keep us hidden?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look back, and even in his most damaged state, Gilmore had an essence of confidence, and this is a moment where you've never really seen him so pale. "We're about to find out, aren't we?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going outside.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going outside, too.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I walk up to Shaun and slap my hand on his forearm and say, what about the bow? Is there anything you can tell us about the bow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "In due time. Keep it at the ready."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn to Cassandra. We need to get all of the citizens underground, immediately.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can't fit everybody.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We can certainly try." She turns to the guard. "Gather everyone we can. Gather--" And there's another roar from outside, this time louder still. "Go! Now!" Everyone starts rushing down the stairs to the outside of Whitestone Castle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go out and I do a Skywrite in the sky again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait! Skywrite?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They already know we're here!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, they don't! They don't necessarily.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Making pictures in the clouds right above the city. It's fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe not.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wouldn't Skywrite anything right now, Keyleth. That screen could keep us hidden. He could be searching for us right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And what about the citizens?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll find another way to alert them. Send out the dog. I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you guys exiting the castle now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do it by hand? We might not have that much time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you step out into the front open patio area, just outside of the castle's main gates, you look up and that faint blue shimmer that encases-- and you can now see it as a dome, and it comes down around, just directly around the city, closing at the very outskirts of the castle. You look in the distance as you see a few dark shapes growing larger and larger.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're coming this way!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you to make a perception check, all of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't make out too much of the detail of their form, but you can definitely see some sort of aerial transport with large wings. At the forefront of them, you see one far larger than the rest. While you can't make out the details at this distance, the one thing you do catch is the bits of sunlight that peek through the clouds, hitting the side of its hide. A bright, piercing white color.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking fucked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see it coasting at an angle around the outside of the city, making its way very quickly towards the outskirts of the town.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's Thordak's army. Asum said himself we're eastward. We're directly in its path.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hold.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dragons have truesight. They already know we're here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe they can't get through this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Any second we wait longer, more people could die!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Send out the guards.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The guards are already running down, by the way, based on Cassandra's orders, and are making their way towards the city. You can already see people coming out of the streets and looking up, covering their ears. Some people are falling to their knees and crying.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pick them up. Keep running until the moment they can't.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They know we're here. This is not a coincidence. They're not flying by. They know we're here. They know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whoosh) You now see the dragon and the flying horde have just come within a mile of the southern portion of the city.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wait!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. Don't do it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're coming for us!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is my home. Wait.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is his home.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Keep moving.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have five seconds to come up with a better fucking plan, or I am doing it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Spread out. Keep moving. Find a position.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. What order are you guys rushing down in?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are we looking at from our vantage point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are looking down at the wide, 60-foot earth path that leads down from the base of Castle Whitestone into the city itself.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If I'm towards the front, I'm moving everyone towards the house where we made the tunnel that goes underneath the Sun Tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so we have Percy at the front.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll be right behind him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, Grog's right behind Percy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll follow behind Grog.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're up above, though? Or are we on ground level at this point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are now on ground level. You're above on the grade that leads down into the city itself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I pull out the broom and I get on the broom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're on the broom.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's clear they're not deviating the path.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not clear. We could just be in their way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He said they're curving.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're now curving around the outside of the western side of the valley.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What are you going to write? What are you going to write?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I would throw up the De Rolo crest, just like before. It's a good alert sign.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: People would just come out screaming. They won't know where to go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then come up with a better damn plan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (roar) Echoing through the valley. You watch as the entire crowd of these entities flies around the west side of the city, curves past. The shadow of the light of the sky, you can see the dark, heavy shadow of the dragon and the wyverns pass over the western side of the city. You can hear distant screams as people begin to freak out at this. It passes over the western side of the city, flying right towards the castle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Arcs past the castle, over the forest, and the entire cluster slowly flaps down and lands at the southernmost beginning peak of the Alabaster Sierras, just north of the city. The dragon (crash noise) lands.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Alert everyone you see.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're scouting us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tell them to get underground. Tell them to be silent.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They don't see us, but they know we're nearby.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What direction are they looking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now, they're looking in all directions, actually.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to get everybody underground while we can.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have time. We have time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you. Find everyone. Tell them, silence. We still have the cavern we built underground. Start making it larger.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shall we scatter? Spread the word?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Spread the word. Tell everyone to get underground.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Under the tree.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go to the cavern under the Sun Tree and I start casting Move Earth and I start clearing it as fast as I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It's going to take you a while, but you begin building this cavern.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As fast as I can.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: More people.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where are we telling people to go?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're scattering.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's the inn that was broken. It's got an entrance. They either go there or they go underneath the castle.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That can hold 30, 40 people?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's making it bigger.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we send people under the castle as well?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, under the castle, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys all begin scattering, grabbing everyone you can. The guards are starting to gather people, and as you get the word out, people begin to quiet, holding their mouths. The guards are holding people silently. People begin ushering en masse up towards this giant exodus from the city, pouring like a funnel up this walkway to the base of Castle Whitestone. Keyleth, as you're down there, you're pressing. The dirt itself is slowly molding its way into this large cavern, pressing downward further and further and opening, further down and opening.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fallout cavern style. Big, lower, bigger, lower.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get about three platforms down before the earth stops responding.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do you mean?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking ziggurat!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The fucking ziggurat!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Other way, other way!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go the other way!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't empty out the earth too much, or it won't support the city.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fallout style. Little pods.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You start creating all these various things, and people start ushering in. It's getting to the point now where there's so many people. You hear crying children, families pressed in, you're feeling claustrophobic and the room's getting hotter and hotter the more bodies that are in there. You keep concentrating and pushing the earth out. You can feel the sweat beads pouring down your face, concentrating, concentrating. You hear the crying and sobbing, and people trying to comfort those that are freaking out. Every now and then you hear a distant echoing cry, a scream of a dragon in the distance, and everyone in the room tenses, and the sobbing gets even louder, then hushed again with whispering silence. You keep pushing and keep pushing, opening. You guys all begin to gather the rest as you watch, with that final cry, the dragon and the wyverns pick up (whoosh) and swoop towards the center of the valley, arcing to the west, and do a wide sweep of the mountain range. (flapping wings)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where's Gilmore?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gilmore has been bringing people en masse down to the castle. You haven't seen him for a number of-- probably 15, 20 minutes or so. The dragons coast around, and begin to disappear in the southeastern distance where they came from. You do, at this point, catch Gilmore, who has moved to the top of the castle and is currently, arms out, concentrating, pouring all the energy he can into that barrier.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Looks like the spell worked.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good work. Good work.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gilmore. Good job.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He eventually comes down from the top of the castle. He is-- eye sockets are sunken. You can see he's pouring with sweat. "I'm going to need a spa day. Because I'm

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where's Pike?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys find Pike. She, during this whole period, was over by the temple of Pelor that she was helping right and construct. Going over and finding out where she's been placed, you guys see that she's shepherded in a good 200 people into that temple, and has been keeping them divinely protected the whole time. As soon as you approach the outside, the people begin to slowly disperse back into the city. Pike walks out, looking out to the sky and locks eyes with you. "You're back!" Runs up and gives you a big hug. Jumps into your arms at this point. You catch her, and realize how heavy she is with the armor on, put her back down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I drop her, because I'm fucking weak.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Guys! Hi!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You did an amazing job with that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That was mostly him. I've never done something like that before. That was-- everything "okay in the Feywild? I'm sorry, I lost my connection. We had to finish this ritual."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it was fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hi, Pike. Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Don't be. I'm glad you're all okay."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you remember the Feywild?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah. We were--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Just making sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He doesn't remember, Pike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You don't remember?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Apparently, we went to the Feywild, and everybody remembers it but me and Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Why is that?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's funnier that way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe you can look at his head later.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe there's a way to cure it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm just too smart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She walks up and takes a look at you, walks up to Grog. Has a good look at the side of your head, knocks you in the temple a few times.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There's nothing... physical. I'll try a restoration." She would have, let's see here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike stats!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was about to say, you have an Ashley app. That's so adorable.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't make me any dumber.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog, that's not possible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, she's going to try Greater Restoration. Let me check something here real fast.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was not fun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy, are you sure it's okay for me to let these people out?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Of course it's not, but yes, definitely let them out. We'll have to make it more secure and safer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think it's gotten quite a bit away from us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Pike reaches up. The gauntlets begin to glow, and as she touches each side of your temples, your eyes close. As some of you watch this, Grog's eyes flash open, and where his pupils and the whites of his eyes were, you now see a flash of divine golden orange light. As it fades, you are slammed with a series of memories that were previously taken from you, and you recall every moment in the Feywild.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (surprised noises)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry! I'm sorry, you didn't get to kill anything. I'm sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, he did! He still killed the big bad guy!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, you did! You did, you killed the one thing. Okay, good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I got petrified!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, well, stoned.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I tried diplomacy! Never again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Lesson learned.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Holy shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you only do that one time a day?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, I can do it once more."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe... well...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, it's okay, yeah! Percy will remember the nude massage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She walks up to Percy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Think of what he's losing, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not losing it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Potentially.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, because it doesn't matter. It's there anyway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Actually, I don't know. I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with that, there's a smattering of memories that are rushing into your mind. It takes you a moment. Your head swims, and you have to almost sit down. You almost stumble off your back foot as your brain now has to reorganize those lost moments. Seven days now immediately restored.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Seven days, ten minutes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Greater Restoration kills Modify Memory.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh! But do I remember having the fake memory? Or do I not remember having a fake memory?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would remember the spell being cast. You remember the fake memory, but you're aware that it's fake.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And that I did it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just say thank you, Percival.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Did it work?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I give her a big hug. I'm so tired. I'm sorry. I'm going to sit down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Glasses?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, but they're so fun to look through! All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They'll give you a headache.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She takes the glasses, and as you're resting, she takes your hand away from your head and puts them back on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I start slowly releasing people from the pods.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: People begin to emerge, and where once there was this air of tension, fear, and desolate acceptance of the end, there's laughter. There's smiles, and even more tears as people begin to realize they have another day to live.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we tell the people as they come out, I know you'll want to celebrate, but please keep it as quiet as possible tonight. We don't know when it could be back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a stillness and a slow understanding and nodding. While everyone takes in the information, one young woman, smeared dirt on her chin, dried tears on her cheek, steps forward and goes, "Thank you. Thank you." And everyone else starts saying, "Thank you. Thank you. Thank you." This sea of thank-yous begins to spread through the crowd immediately in your vicinity.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't thank us. Thank Shaun Gilmore.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gilmore and Pike. Allura.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They all quietly go back to their silence and begin to slowly disperse themselves throughout the city where they were before this incursion happened.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go up to Percy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I forgot that Shaun was Gilmore's first name.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He was like, who's Shaun?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Intelligence of six.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So fucking method. Method, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I hope you know that I would never--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shut up. Thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I hope you know that I was only trying to improve your life with a wonderful happy memory, and it was mostly true.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know where you sleep. People work for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's still, eyes to the sky, not truly trusting this quiet. He goes, "It seems we don't have any "time to lose. What resources do you have to fight back? What have you learned? Please tell me you "have better news than I have."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, we've got a few of these Vestiges, so we're a little powered up. But we're not quite sure what their full abilities are. It's significant, but we think they do more, we're just not sure how much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What more do you need?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I fly up in the air while this conversation's going on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't go too high.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not too high.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't know where the thing is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I know, I want to go to the very top where I see the shimmer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah and it's a squat shimmer, not a full dome and it's like a very extended type dome.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. But it's high enough, that I mean it's higher than the castle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's high enough where you can get about 80 feet up and you start to see enough detail in the shimmer where you're like, "Okay, I'm getting close."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is this stupid? Can I shoot my Oracle Arrow in that direction?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. Absolutely not.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (high-pitched) Why would you bring attention to us?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's an arrow!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're long gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are gone. The time has passed. They're miles and miles and miles and miles and miles at the speed they were travelling. You're a good shot, but I don't know if you could arc an arrow that far.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh well, I guess that's true. I thought it was a ten-minute, because it's Fenthras I thought it was a long-ass arrow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can't you tell what direction the dragons were heading?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! Wait, okay, so the Oracle Arrow, is it like you fire it, and then it shoots somewhere and it sticks there and I can see through it for ten minutes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. Or see through it as it's fired, the minute it leaves the bow you can project your sight through the arrow for up to 10 minutes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It can't fly for infinity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. It still arcs like a regular arrow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That makes sense. I foresaw it just going, because I thought it was like a special kind of arrow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's really good for people without flying brooms.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because now I understand how it works. I've learned something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What direction were the wyverns travelling, were they travelling back? Or were they travelling along--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They were heading southeast.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So not back, they came from the west, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They swooped in from the west, from that side.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But they originated in the west, and they are currently travelling southeast?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. However, it was Vorugal, it was the white dragon, which from what Gilmore is saying has been roosting over at the top of the ruins of Draconia.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which is to the east.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So this was not the group that had set off from Emon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: To the west.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why do I know that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Here, here's the map. We're up here. This is the group that was coming from Emon. These guys came from somewhere over here? Where's Draconia?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I cast Primeval Awareness and see if it's within six miles of us right now, still? Or if it's farther away from that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought that Draconia's on a whole another continent.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, it is. It's over here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's over on Wildemount.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to see if they're just camping out around us or if they're going away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are they going back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Using for dragons, I assume, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. It's my favored enemy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. I would say as part of your Primeval Awareness--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Emon is LA.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Sensing at this point, with the day of travel and everything, you have no sense of dragons in that direction or anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. They're further than six miles away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, there are minor essences in the northern area, but nothing beyond what you've already sensed in the Alabaster Sierras. Nothing on the level of strength that the draw of an ancient dragon would bring on your radar.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: To answer your previous question, there are four Vestiges left.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That we know of.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's a staff.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, there's other objects that we haven't--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Four left. Because we have Whisper, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no, we don't have Whisper.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So there's five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do we have any other allies, friends, people who are sworn to aid us and--?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh! Yeah, yeah! Your parents.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Technically, the elves of Syngorn are building an army. However, who knows if they'll actually come through.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The werewolves could be called upon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think they would understand it would do them well to help what is a threat to all of us."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You would think.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One werewolf has vowed allegiance to us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In the Feywild.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In another plane of existence, which I don't know if that's a problem.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not going to count on that one."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not as ridiculous as you think.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. Your former pals.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whatever remnants of Draconia perhaps?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Wait. So the last time we saw the main portion, the bulk of Emon's army from Fort Daxio was "sent to Syngorn before this attack happened?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do we have any knowledge on their whereabouts?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A lot are there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They're there?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A lot of-- at least all of our guards from Emon are in Syngorn, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. Our guards aren't in Syngorn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not our personal guards, but Emon's guards.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did see quite a few soldiers from Emon there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh we did?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was distracted.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay. You did have a lot to think about with your dad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They would not answer our call but if someone has relations with the Clasp, they are always an option for manpower.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I have been dealing with them and definitely-- they're not much of an army, but "they're definitely good at acquiring information and I currently have a few of them trying to find "out as much as they can about Thordak."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's also the Ashari druids, who will definitely want to help our cause.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is very true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is good to know. Well, any more that come your way or any possibilities you have to "bring more to our cause, please, do so."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's a candle-maker who might help out. I would put him in the strong maybe category as well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't mention that Vex flies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Big weapons, anything. I'll take anything at this point really."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There are options but we need to discuss what happened today. This changes some things.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we need more offence, less defense. I don't know if that will work a second time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're mad. We need defense. This is not a site of a victory, this is a site of our end. We need bunkers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. We need to move everybody underground the same way we did in Emon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can spend more time fleshing out and reinforcing the bunkers to make them--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll discuss a warning system to get people underground.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But when the dragon came here just now, they saw nothing, correct?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We hope.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there a way that we can spread false rumors that the city of Whitestone has been magically moved to another plane or something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's wonderful. That's smart.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Some way of getting that word to Draconia or I don't--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Putting the word out that we're other places than we are. Putting the sound--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Asum thinks to himself and goes--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can't we drop it into the Clasp's pipeline?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some folks who don't see honor but the necessity "to stay alive override any sort of previous friendships."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Best not to mention our name. I don't think we're cool with the Clasp after our last meeting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, they don't like us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good to know. I'll look about planting that information. I'll do the best I can in that "regard. I've been told that you've already felled another of the Conclave, is that correct?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's true. Umbrasyl. Dead and gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That will certainly stir some attention from them."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, and if not that, then the message left in there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They know we did it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Strange that he had all those wyverns with him, though. Umbrasyl had none. He was by himself.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They don't like each other, though, this is some sort of loose partnership.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but didn't they say the white one was more savage. More emotional?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The white one was more vain.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, the black one, Umbrasyl is the one that's--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh you're right, the white one is a hunter, it's primal. Hates others. You're right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe the army's going to head to-- no, we could be so lucky if it was on its way to attack it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Black ones like torture, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, they like to make people suffer.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like there should be trading cards.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So the white one's like Predator?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shut up! There's notes somewhere in here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Just be warned: fell one dragon, that might make them nervous. Fell another and that's almost "certain to bring retaliation."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We were hoping to distract them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, the next wyrm you decide to fell will probably be the start of this war."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we ask, why would it bring retaliation? How would they know it was us?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We did sign the card.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We left our names.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe the next one we can sign as somebody else.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What if we don't sign it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Even if we don't, they probably are going to get much more vindictive overall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And just as much as we can scry on them, they can scry on us. I'm sure they've been watching us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think they know where we are. I think they know when we travel, I just don't think they know where we are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Have any of the living ones seen you?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have any what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Have any of the living ones seen you and know you for who you are?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When we killed the first one, there were a bunch of jewels in the wall and we saw a bunch of eyeballs.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He did not know our name, but he has seen us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Raishan saw us, the white one saw us, all of them saw us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then it is very possible."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait a second, you just said no one knew we were here, none of them knew we were here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They just attacked here. And we just got back here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gilmore was scrying on them. It took three days for him to get here. That's how he knew.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not because we have a leak.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We probably do. We should assume we have a leak.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to blame Shaun.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is he Shaun now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're more than welcome to."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry! (chuckles)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's sitting down, wiping his brow with this really fine scarf.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Judging based on what happened in Emon, we know that they have an insider, we just don't know who yet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They do? We know this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would assume that there's nothing we say that they don't know at this point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They struck during a political--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: During a council meeting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Somebody has to be telling them things.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Someone probably very high up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It could be Raishan taking the form of a human again, for all we know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who was there and lived? Besides us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jarett catches up, by the way. (panting) "Is everyone all right?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. How are the citizens? Did you get everyone in there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Everyone seems to be safe and accounted for. There was a lot of fear, of course, but "elation, whatever you did." And he looks at you and looks at Shaun. "Whatever you did, keep doing "it, please."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I insight check Jarett.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hard to read that fella. Slippery.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I do an insight check on Asum?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, that was a Luck.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: First one was good anyway.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you're just hoping? First one was really good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: About Jarett?! You're insighting Jarett?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seeker Asum.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Perhaps we should not have... assumed.

lines.name: MARISHA
