lines.text: Hey, Travis! How is it you're on this side of the table?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well I was looking for a Loot Crate. Have you guys seen any Loot Crates?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Well I've got some of the great swag that you can get in a Loot Crate. Why this shirt came in one last week.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's incredible! How do I get one of those?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You go to LootCrate.com/CriticalRole to see your selection and then if you sign up, you get three dollars off the first month, which is a really good deal!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ironically when we played the game at home this is exactly what we'd do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Totally.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sam who are you talking to? You're facing a potted plant.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm talking to Seeker Asum! He's a big fanboy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gilmore stands up and catches the edge of Vax's shoulder.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, so, what's your plan? What's the next order of business?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get you a drink, I think.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A drink would be great."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we talk and drink.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. We need to talk about barricading underground. Making it more secure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There isn't much commerce currently happening in the city, since right now everything's in survival mode, so there's no exchange of money, you guys are presented with drinks. The lanterns are lit on the inside from other villagers that are just happy to help. And the central table is set where you all sit around and quietly have a few sips.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While everyone's sitting, can I just pull him over to a corner for a second?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How are you doing, personally?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Me?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Wondrous! I'm doing great! (chuckles) I'm exhausted."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shaun, I--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll be fine."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You sure?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, I'm fine."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's been a long time since I put my energy and talents towards anything beyond making shiny "things. Feels nice to be helping others."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I feel we're seeing your true talents.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm at my wits' end with these. Do you want to see true talents? You should ask Allura to show "you what she's capable of when she gets back."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She is pretty nifty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sighs heavily)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, come on, come and have a drink.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he like leans on you a bit and you both make it back to the table. The rest of you--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This booze is okay, but Grog, I could really use the finest wine I've ever had.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit, hold on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've got some fancy-ass bottles.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I reach into the bag of holding and I grab five expensive-ass bottles of wine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Holla!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan and I will share one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just one bottle between the two of you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't weigh very much.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm involved in this. This is exciting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys scatter the wine amongst your glasses. Drinks are had as you begin to discuss the plan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pour one for the landlord as well. He's letting us drink our wine in his room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Defenses. Allies, what's the next plan? "What's the next--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I've a question. If I were to call somewhere a City of Brass, where would you think that would be?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Asum goes, "There are cities that use brass in parts of construction in Wildemount, that's as far--" Gilmore leans forward and goes, "No, that's in the Elemental Plane of Fire. That's a "dangerous, terrible place that you should never go."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We were already there once, actually.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Terrible dangerous places you should never go are practically our middle name.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We saw Thordak there, actually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh! Even more of a reason not to go!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, he's here now, so Fire Plane's probably safer!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's got a very fair point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why do you ask, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, look, the Plate of the Dawnmartyr is in a City of Brass, but I don't know where that is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I bet that sounds something Pike would like.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Draconia is in Wildemount?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Draconia is in Wildemount, yes."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. And so is the big white fuck, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. Are any of the Vestiges in Wildemount?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The City of Brass?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Whereabouts are the Vestiges?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One at the bottom of the sea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: One is in Marquet?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The City of Brass is in the Plane of Fire. We've covered that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not in Draconia? It's in the Plane of Fire?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The city is in the Plane of Fire.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Correct. Where's Ank'Harel?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ank'Harel is on the continent of-- what's it's called?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's been awhile." And looks at--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's the continent? I suddenly blanked on it. You just said it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Marquet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Marquet. It's on the continent of Marquet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's where I grew up, or nearabouts, at least."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where you grew up, Gilmore?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, not in the city, a little ways out a bit."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're Marquatian?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Originally, yes, but I've been living here most of my life. Soon as I had the opportunity to "leave-- It's a free plane here in Tal'Dorei and all the shops I can muster... until they all got "destroyed."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good times.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's fine. I'd made the bottom floors too small anyway. More space. Next time."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You ever want to revisit home?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Maybe. Nah. I need to stay here and maintain this."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes you do. If you don't mind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What about the endless maze of the Abyss? That's another place that we're supposed to go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Also another plane of existence.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know much about the Abyss, but I know that it's probably the worst place ever."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Abyssal. That's where demons come from.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Worse than the Fire Plane?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's correct."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's the thing that killed Pike.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, isn't that where the rakshasa's going to be?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's in the Nine Hells.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's a devil.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ironically is somewhere else entirely.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I think we can table Meowmix for a little bit. Somebody told us it takes a while.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Months and months.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Months but we also don't want to wait until--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not forever.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who's got a map?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've got a map.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where's the Ozmit Sea?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Before we even think of this, we should see what we're-- I don't think we're going to collect all of the Vestiges. We should see what other Vestiges we think are going to be helpful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's like the Pacific Ocean.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which direction is it? Towards Draconia?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. Draconia's across the Atlantic Ocean in France.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But the Ozmit Sea is where the Water Ashari reside. And I have to go there anyway. It's also where Pike is very familiar. I'm pretty sure that's the sea that she sailed?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And the Vestige there is the staff?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whisper, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whisper, the blade.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Whisper, the blade.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Someone mentioned that the white dragon is very vain and very savage. He's got like all those wyverns around him. That's a little bit of a bitch for us. We're usually good one dragon on all of us. You got a whole gang, worse for us. So what about if we played to his vanity, and maybe sent him knocking on one of his Conclave brother's doors. Maybe start a little beef that maybe's not there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do we do that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know, the idea just popped up. I'm looking for your help and shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's a big picture man. Here's the detail fellow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know how tired I am right now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're so tired.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that we've been thinking about this the wrong way. I think that we've been treating this as a battle. And we have to start treating this like a war, which is a very different creature.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we guerrillas?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are absolutely not.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Beret.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wolverines!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We need to reinforce this city not as a final stand, but as a place where there might be survivors. Because if they come here, there's no battle to be fought. It's just a loss.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to take it--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Elsewhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point Jarett steps out from back of the room and says, "The more time that goes by, "the more chance there is that the battle, the war, will be fought here. On our turf. The faster we "move, the better chance we have of bringing it to theirs, so let us not dilly-dally."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You mentioned about having our own mole at one point. Our own inside man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not going to volunteer myself as a slave to the dragon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keep thinking about it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are a sexy dinosaur.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm considering it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You'll be the Hercules Mulligan of Vox Machina.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Hercules Mulligan!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would like to talk to some of the magic users about installing some sort of-- or perhaps helping me install a non-magical dragon raid signal so that the population knows to be quiet, and knows to quietly go underground. In the event of the next fly-by.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They all look at each other and Gilmore nods. "That's actually, I wouldn't say "rudimentary, but it's definitely within my skill set."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Would triggering it possibly alert them to our existence? Does it make holding up the shield--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not if I can maintain it underneath the barrier."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does the barrier block sound and visuals?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It should."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And is there any way that we can help you make this barrier more permanent and stronger?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know. This was crafted for this reason. This isn't a long standing existing "incantation. This was crafted through the minds of Drake Thunderbrand and Allura and myself and "Pike's aid. This is a new magic, it's experimental, and to be perfectly honest, I'm very "glad it succeeded because I was--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just guessing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Essentially."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, Gilmore, as a sidebar, what about that black ball beneath the city? Has anything been learned of it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We've been a bit distracted."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's what I thought.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would like to put it to use.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're at war.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can't move it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're not going to move it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going inside it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to put the private council table in the room with it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In the room where it happens?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So they can't scry into the room, it cancels all magic.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So no glamor will survive, no magic will survive, no trick can be allowed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I love your mind, Percy. Have I told you that? I love your mind. I love it."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's probably a bad sign, but thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We'll do that immediately. It sounds like a grand plan." Asum says, "Not a worry. We'll do that immediately."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll just have to Seeker Asum that it happened? (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Start finding more allies, move quickly. But we should not dally too long.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We might want to do both.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jarett says, "If you're looking to go to the Ozmit Sea, you'll probably need a ship of some "kind. It's quite a far travel and that distance as well and the docks on the west coast right now "are, well they're locked down at Emon."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Could Cabal's Ruin--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long is the travel to Marquet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Travel by boat, across the Ozmit, maybe about a week, a week and a half. Skyship, maybe "half as long."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Airship. Airship. Airship?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gilmore actually steps in and is like, "Technically, I have a teleportation sigil outside "the city. I could probably just get you there."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, to go to where? Marquet?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Walking is really good for the health though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And first level characters, which we are not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hold on. Before we decide that Marquet is the thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's Cabal's Ruin, correct? We're going to search for Cabal's Ruin.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we at all just forgetting the fact that Draconia is lying in ruins?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't have time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's not about time. The dragon is sitting on top of Draconia.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we know where to find him to kill him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Unless we know how to take on that dragon, we can't save anyone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: wE've killed dragons before.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will feel better with one or two more Vestiges in our pocket.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: By the skin of our teeth, Scanlan. By the skin of its gut.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We got lucky.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I like Grog's idea. Is there a way to explore that any further?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pitting the dragons against each other?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think it's a great idea worth exploring.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Seeker Asum is on it. He said that he was going to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seeker Asum is great, but we're the best in the business. I wouldn't leave our plan A to someone not us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seeker Asum is telling people that this city has been magicked away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Asum is also still at the table.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, he's right there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're drunk, we will talk about you in third person as much as we want.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're just reiterating the things that you told us you were going to say.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's all right."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We figured you would speak up if you had issue.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus it's really fun to say your name.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Never heard it before, I assure you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How far away is Draconia from here? Travel wise?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, my usual travel to Wildemount is across the northern channel here. I'd say you're "looking at about two weeks of travel by ship across the Lucidian Ocean."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or we can always teleport. I can Tree Stride. I can always Tree Stride.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have you been to Draconia?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can scry and look at a tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tree Stride is a short distance. You mean Transport via Plants.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Whatever. They all sound the same. I can scry, look at a tree, and then we go through that tree.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If there's any trees left.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's definitely at least--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm hoping there's a tree on that continent.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we talking though about how scrying is a little dangerous right now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: When you're scrying on dragon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When you're scrying on a tree.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, the tree doesn't know it's being spied on.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Doesn't Draconia have an army there? If there are any survivors, anyone we can bring back to Whitestone, shouldn't we be accumulating those people?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think if there's a dragon sitting on top of them, removing people from him is--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're sneaky, we're so sneaky!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we sneaky?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! Pike's not even here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have your memories of the Feywild, do you remember sloshing around in that black sludge? Very loudly?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you remember us walking into the town center to kill Kevdak? That wasn't sneaky.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, no that was personal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Grog, I think you're thinking of a battle we can win, as opposed to a war we're losing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, no, look I'm not trying to pick a fight with a dragon, I'm just going to make sure that dragonborn are there and we can help them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can help them by killing the dragon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vax is agreeing with me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Remember, once a dragon is down, it's--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's on."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog is the best thinker.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. We pull the trigger on one, we pull the trigger on all of them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't believe if we fight one that means we have to fight--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, listen. Again, I'm not trying to kill the white dragon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What is the white dragon going to do--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I want him to go pick a fight with the other dragons.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How are we going to do that, though?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are we going to do there to make that happen?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can't really stroll up to it and be like--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You guys don't know how to pick a fight? You honestly can't brainstorm one way to pick a fight?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We are very good at picking fights. It's getting the dragons to pick fights on others.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can probably plan a ruse.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, and how would you do it, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would talk mad shit to the white dragon on behalf of the green dragon. I would rep the green dragon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, Grog, he will never see through that! That's brilliant.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are really strong. That's the end of it, I have nothing else to say.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm just saying, I feel like an opportunity's being wasted here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think an opportunity's being tabled briefly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We've got to think about it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think this is nearly as time sensitive.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fine. Someone else do the thinking.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Breeding hostility between the two is something that could take weeks, which we don't have.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we could start it. It's also something other people can do while we do other things.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes. Delegate.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But how? It literally involves going to one dragon and saying: Hey, did you hear what that other dragon said about you? That's all I got.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, there are other ways to do it. In traditional warfare, you can do things like cause damage to the property of one dragon and leave scant evidence that the other dragon, or one of the dragon's people, was somehow responsible. Have a raiding, somehow get wyverns to raid near--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, hang on. That first thing you said.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. It's the easiest level.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think I might have an idea. Okay, we know the white dragon is vain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right? We know that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All dragons to an extent are vain. It's part of the nature of the chromatics.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: White dragon loves the thrill of the hunt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The white dragon is the most comparably primal. They're all in various stages of hyperintelligence. The white dragon is the one that's the most... beastlike.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If the white dragon is a hunter, the easiest way to incite damage is to sneak into the city and start mauling and killing Draconians that are left over, and just leaving bodies everywhere that he wasn't responsible for.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is the sort of decisions we're going to start having to make.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if somebody can Polymorph into a little green dragon or something?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you went to 11 there on let's start continuing the genocide.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck shit up as a dragon and leave evidence behind as a green dragon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've seen the green dragon. Raishan?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have seen the dragon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How big?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gargantuan. And you cannot Polymorph into dragons. You can only transform into beasts.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I understand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fairly large, yeah. I'd say probably-- Raishan is the smallest of the dragons you saw, but even at the smallest of them, is still a good 30 feet to the shoulder.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could do that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Gather all the papier-mâché you have in the city.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could do something pretty close to that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I bet you could do a lot of incredible things.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you Tony Robbins? (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think this is a conversation that can continue through Marquet. I don't think we're going to come up with the best idea tonight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Here's what we learned.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: At dawn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: At dawn we drink some more. We learned that Thordak is enslaving sculptors to build his image all around Emon. What we have learned is it seems that each of the dragons have picked a city, a domain. Maybe this domain was part of the bargain to join Thordak's cause. Help me, you get your own city.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A reasonable and astute observation, yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So I bet the white dragon would be real pissed off if statues of Thordak started popping up around Draconia.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or the green dragon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or the green dragon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or maybe even statues where Umbrasyl's nest was.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's pick a dragon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Vorugal is the white dragon?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Raishan is the green. Here's the problem with goading Vorugal the white to find and kill Raishan the green. No one knows where Raishan the green is, including Vorugal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do you know Vorugal doesn't know?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because Raishan's the shapeshifter, and no one knows where she is, including Gilmore, who's been scrying for a week to try to find her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but the white dragon might have some way to communicate.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we know how they communicate?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, we do. There were some baubles in a wall in Krieg's secret cave.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They have other balls, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Gilmore, Asum, do either of you have a theory on how they communicate?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gilmore looks to Asum. "I have not been to any of their bases. Asum, you've been watching Thordak." He looks back. "Within his domain in the Cloudtop, he has... apparently an overhead airplane."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's very loud.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trust me, it was strange. "He has a number of various spies that are sworn to him that act as "his network of information to and from the Cloudtop and his throne of black glass and molten "rock. He does have singular pillars placed around that contain four orbs that he would speak into on "occasion."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And didn't we see something similar in Umbrasyl's and when we killed the blue?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We saw orbs in Umbrasyl's?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, remember, it cracked and it was like, I'm coming for you! And we were like, we don't know what that means! And we ignored it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was in Brimscythe's.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did we see that in the black?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They were broken already.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. They were already shattered.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He shattered them. Fuck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why did he shatter them?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So that we wouldn't be able to scry on anyone else. Or he was pissed!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He was pissed at the other dragons, maybe.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But it's not safe to assume-- Asum, sorry-- that they're not in communication. We have to assume that they are. I'm so sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's all right. It's not like my childhood friend Purvon." (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There is a thought. This is a very good idea. You've got a very good idea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's the idea?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ultimately, though, what we need is we need someone who knows the dragons' weaknesses. We need to know what pushes their buttons.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We know what pushes their buttons.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We need to know what pushes the reset button. Why am I speaking in video game metaphor?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nothing. Drink.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can throw up some statues and cause some havoc, but if they have these orbs that communicate with each other, then the white can call Thordak and say: Hey, what's up with these statues? And Thordak can say: No, it's not me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not statues. Idols. Small images of the white dragon for worship.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're gambling on jealousy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Start hiding them in places. If we start seeding them, especially in Emon, as if he is trying to get people to worship him in other cities as well, silently, quietly underneath--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll make t-shirts that say Team Vorugal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We just have to make sure that we don't use the stone from here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, because we know that Thordak is definitely vain.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And this will piss him off. And if he says what are you doing, I don't know anything about this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, he would deny it. Of course he would deny it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And we're assuming-- sorry-- that they'll ask instead of jumping to conclusions.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Even if he jumps to conclusions, he would be pissed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we know he'll be pissed off, more or less.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His scarred eye twitches for a moment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And we wonder why people hate us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Asum leans into the conversation and goes, "We have many crafters and artisans that are "within the grasp of the Clasp as well, within Emon. We can begin to have these made and "scattered throughout the various offerings brought to the center of the city."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Little shrines, hidden in ruins.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I like this."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hashtag Team Vorugal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We can make this happen." You can make that happen. Hashtag Team Vorugal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I still will admit that Cabal's Ruin is one of the Vestiges I feel would be-- and not just because I would like to use it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is Ank'harel and the Ozmit Sea in the same area? Can we hit one on our way to the other?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Ozmit Sea is in between Tal'Dorei and-- from your perspective, it's Tal'Dorei and Marquet, and the Ozmit Sea is what's in between.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So we could do a triple.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We could do a triple. Because I have to get to the Water Ashari at some point.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And that's very important, because we need them on our side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Between what and what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ozmit Sea, so it's over here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's between what and who?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Ozmit Sea is between Marquet and Tal'Dorei.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is this Tal'Dorei?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're on Tal'Dorei.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So Marquet is Japan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: More Australia.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Got it. Is this world round? Can we go the other way?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, this world is shaped like a d20, so we're on the flat part at the five.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can't go the other way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could eventually get there. It is round.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would I know how fast dragons can actually fly? If it's a two-week trip to get to Draconia from where we are--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two weeks via ship. Ocean ship.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. If they were flying, how fast could they get there, potentially?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm only saying, maybe it's empty, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What is?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Draconia.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to make some mathematics here, if you'll excuse me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm only saying, if they were just here--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But we could bamf there right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Check it out and get out before they get back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Get people out, do recon, whatever.

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: Plant some seeds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They've probably left a good amount of army there to keep people under control. We'd have to get in and out in a couple of hours.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And what would our mission be?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dump a couple of statues.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't have them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let other people do that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait. What about, instead of dumping statues, we find these orbs? We find his lair, we find his orbs, and we call Thordak and we do a voice like: Yo, Thordak! You're a dickhead! I'm going to come kill you! Or we just smash them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know why everyone's so excited about the notion of pissing off the dragons to the point at which they all come here, but it is a way to go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They don't know we're here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They know we're here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm just pointing out an opportunity where there is one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A few days.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It would take them a few days to get there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A few days? We would have a whole fucking day!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What time is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point in time, it's mid-afternoon, evening.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have to rest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percival, even just for intelligence, even if it was brief, even to see what is going on there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have to make sure that we can get out immediately, and we also have to agree that if things start looking too iffy, we run.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have an idea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have the best ideas.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Lay it on me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you Seeming us to all look like lizard army members?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tomorrow. And we'll look like us, except vaguely like lizard people.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why not wyverns?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: First of all, the lizard army, is that different from wyverns? So they're just scaly creepers. I can do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you seen the lizard people?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, but I'll see them when we get there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They attacked you in Emon. They were on the wyverns. They're humanoid. They're a little larger than one of your half-elf companions or Percy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We fought them on the airship, too, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, those were bandits. You fought wyverns.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could be lizard people, for sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We could look like lizard people, and it would trick anybody who wasn't a dragon. And if the dragon came, we would be fucked. That would be the end. That would be game over.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) We could be lizard people!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to go on record as saying I do not think this is the right move.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you think is the right move?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He wants to go to Marquet to find some cloak that may or may not help us in a week.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Will help us. Getting three more Vestiges, two more Vestiges, just a little bit more power before starting to play chess again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really the only point of going there would be reconnaissance. That's it. No fighting.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When else are we going to know for sure?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's an ancient dwarven saying, and I'm trying to remember where I heard it, but it goes somewhere along the lines of, it's never a three-hour tour. That's my fear.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I know an ancient dwarven one that says no risk...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Your mind is a grandfather clock, you know that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's correct twice a day, easily.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we go, what is our mission?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To get as many innocents out as we can.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. That sounds wonderful, but if we get people out, they're going to know something happened.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I figured if we find good fighters once again, and do our tree, our teleport thing--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can get 13 people out. That's it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But it could be the 13 people that could change the tide.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is not going to be a fight of 13 people.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We had a group of 50 goliaths, and they were all killed instantly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what I'm saying.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus, if we're lizard people, the survivors aren't going to be wanting--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're going to be wondering who we are, first off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're going to be afraid of us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I would only want to go there if we had a distinct plan to disrupt or trick or steal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Disrupting communications is a great tactic.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're not going to be able to disrupt communication.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't think we're going to make it to the jewels and smashy-smash?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think that's a good idea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I slice the dragon's throat! And I say, I am victorious!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That sounds like a plan. Let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what are you guys doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tightening up. We're going to go. What are we going for?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Smash the orbs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, here's something else I want to put into perspective. If I scry and teleport us to the black dragon's lair, I can do one more scry, and then I would burn my seventh level spell to get us there again, and then I'd be tapped out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we wouldn't be able to bamf out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'd be staying the night.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I can get us a safe place to stay for the night, no matter where we are.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But it means this is not a one-day, this is a three-day mission.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could not teleport us. It depends on how many times. I've got two teleports, so I can teleport us there and teleport us out, but we'd be doing it from here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We teleport to the black dragon's lair, we sleep overnight, teleport in, teleport out. And then sleep overnight, teleport either to Whitestone or to Marquet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you teleport today? Or are you done?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can only use that once per day, though, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And if that's the case, it's tomorrow, then we lose that two-day grace period. Unless we go right now and sleep overnight in Draconia and start first thing in the morning.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And risk a very reasonable reason that they would know where we are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As far as I know, Plane Shift can't teleport you on the same plane. It brings you specifically to another plane of existence.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. I'm saying I cast Plane Shift from the Feywild to here. That's all I'm saying. But I used that, and that's a seventh level spell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So if we go to Draconia tonight, if we want to sleep in the mansion, we can't, because I changed his memory.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh fuck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we would have to sleep out in the open as lizard people.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Too many negatives now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is danger zone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're getting a lot of cons. There's not so many pros.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We need to sleep anyway, because we're exhausted.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh man. I can find all sorts of problems with a situation if I look hard enough.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is so astute. It's 12:00. My god, he had a thought.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Opportunity. Honestly. There's a dragon's perch, and he is vacated, and it will probably never happen again as far as we know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I disagree. I think the next time they come to attack and kill us, it will be vacated.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cool. While they're killing Whitestone because we didn't take advantage of this moment, then we'll go to Draconia.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I agree. I legitimately agree.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can sleep and wake up in the morning and teleport there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We do have to sleep, regardless. There's no getting around sleep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can't fucking go there when we haven't slept, Grog. We'll all die.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can't actually get there right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's also no guarantee that they're going straight back there. Maybe they're heading somewhere else. They were heading with an army to somewhere. It's probably not a city they've already conquered.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They were heading southeast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Southeast is what you saw, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's where they live.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So they're probably heading back home.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Balls. Then where did they come from? What were they doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They were fishing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They thought that we might be here, and they took a quick look around, which is why I don't want to make any more noise around here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's sleep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to go to the barkeep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is no barkeep here. This tavern has been opened just for you guys to be served. There is no current owner here. Most everyone who helped you open this are yourselves and a couple of civilians that were just there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there a civilian waitress?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is no waitress. There are a couple civilians outside, but as soon as you guys started talking, all the civilians left the room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're so nice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no barmaid at all?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your nobility is showing, Percival.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: These white gloves are sullied. I need a new set of white gloves, please.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're shooting mittens, and you're so uncouth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have an Unseen Servant. Do you need a servant? I make an Unseen Servant for him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a wisp of air.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Command him as you see fit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Never mind. This is what I get for trying to be nice to anybody. I've learned my lesson.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I tip the Unseen Servant.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You toss the coin and it (clinks) to the ground.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I pounce on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You (soft impact) into this weird cluster of air. It's pushing your beard hair back, and your mouth is full of all that air pushing into it as you reach into the Unseen Servant, grab the coin, and pull it out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well done. You got a gold.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll sleep for now. We'll wake up in the morning, and we'll either go in one direction or the other.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good plan, guys. Good plan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We came up with nothing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's so not true. We came up with a lot. We just have to sleep and then make a decision based on what the world looks like in the morning.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dream about a cloak, Percival. Maybe we can get you a cloak.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That cloak sounds useful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, let's sleep. Let's go to the castle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys find your way to the castle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As a side, I want to grab Vex for a quick walk on the way to the castle. I want to go by the cemetery. Has it been worked on, by the way? I suppose I'll find out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You did say Vex, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You said Vex.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vax.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You grab him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have something to show you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The title I gave your sister doesn't come with much, but it does come with one, at the moment, tiny plot of land, on which a crypt sits. This was the resting place of the father and grandfather and assorted family members of the man you killed the first night we came here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You want my sister to live in a mausoleum?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. I want something else to live in a mausoleum. This is actually for you. Open it. I go and I light the two little torches on the side. This is very traditional, and it should open. Do you trust me?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Uh...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good answer. I'll go in first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy enters the building.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I follow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What was once a relatively decent mausoleum seems to have been gutted, retrofit, and now you see standing before you, is a mostly constructed shrine to the Raven Queen.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I figured it would be a good idea. I've had my fill of gods, but I'm not so foolish to think that we do not need them still. This is here when you need it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am having trouble.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would like to live long enough to be someone else. I think you understand that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've been really angry at you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've been encouraging it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know if it's entirely fair, but I can't shake it. I don't know that I'm willing to let go of it yet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They will not help me. Maybe you will.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've always liked you. From the beginning, I've always liked you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've always liked you, too.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are intelligent and charming.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And good in a tight spot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's the open spaces where I suffer. The tight spots, I feel very good about. It's the open spaces. This is a very tight spot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would like to be friends with you again. I just have a condition.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My penchant for forgiveness with my sister's welfare is razor thin.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you can respect that, then we don't have a problem.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you know why I titled your sister?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have some idea.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She thought she was missing something that-- and I use this term loosely-- ordinary people... We have a magic we use, to convince people that we deserve the things we get, those of us who were born this way. It was treating her unfairly and limiting her ability to see her world for what it was worth, and it was a simple and easy fix. She is going to wake up one morning-- not yet, but soon-- and realize that money will not make her happy, and that trying to please that awful father will not make her happy. The first step in that is realizing that he's weak, and there's no better way to do that than being better titled than your parents.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't agree with that line of thinking.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know. But you are not her. And I'm not saying it's the truth, but it is what I believe is in her heart. I think perhaps that might lift. I will never hurt her. I will never hurt anybody intentionally, especially not you, any more than I already have. In return, I ask: never take your eyes off me. Never trust me. And that is the best friend that you can be.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will recommit to that same promise I made.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can like me. I would love that. And in fact, I hope that I can earn your like.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I do like you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just never want to earn your trust.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, then it's your lucky day.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A gentle title will suit your sister well. I'm leaving.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy walks out. You're left alone in the silence and darkness, looking at the small shrine before you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm on board. You have me. Whatever you will. I have something I need to take care of, which you know, and I hope you will help me with it. But I do not take your gift lightly. You have me. I close the door again and head back to town.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Back into town. You guys quietly keep your distance in your walk, find your way back to the castle to your respective rooms, and an evening's rest takes you all.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I hear Vax go to his room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you waiting to hear Vax go to his room?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm waiting to hear Vax go to his room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You wait for a long time, and no sound comes to your ears.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go to sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. And with that, as you guys rest for the night, we're going to take a quick bathroom break. We'll be back here in a few minutes. We had a friend come and deliver a gift to Laura, which you can see presented on the table now. It is a replica that someone, Kiki Day, made this awesome prop replica of Fenthras.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Obviously, we're going to send a picture on Twitter so you guys can see it, but it lights up different colors!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Design based on David Rodriguez's concept art for Fenthras.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's got Elvish for "protector" and "growth."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's so badass.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did I say it right? Protector, not protection? Protector is right!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Protector and growth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Say what?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is awesome.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you so much!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Kiki!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're unbelievable.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should we put it down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. There we go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lean it up against the table.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. As you guys come to consciousness the next morning, the storm has come in now--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: By the way, I got terrible sleep. I replayed everything Saundor said in my head a hundred times.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a general wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're paralyzed from fear.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I am terrible! Wisdom saving throw? 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12? Okay. Your evening is hard-pressed. You do manage to get a full night's sleep; you do not suffer any exhaustion. You do manage to get rest, though the nightmares do come in memory of your last encounter at the Feywild, and Saundor's words still swimming around in your head, finding cracks in your sense of self. But you still are stalwart against the choice you made and the friends that were at your back. And as you all come to consciousness, the sound of rain outside of the castle against the exterior stone greets you with the morning. You can smell the fresh rain in the air, and eventually come down to find breakfast prepared, a meal earned.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not chicken.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not chicken, no. This is eggs, fruits. A classic Whitestone breakfast. Chicken

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Baked beans. Tell me there's baked beans!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The thick, single-slab bacon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Blood pudding.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Basically an Irish breakfast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's fresh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The rain is good. It will mean that they'll have an easier time figuring out the water level while they're digging out beneath the Sun Tree and making sure that it's secure. I love this weather.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well? To Marquet or to Draconia? What's it going to be? Should we vote?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: An attempt at an object of power or an attempt at friends in power?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which is which?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Draconia has friends in power.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Speaking of friends, we should probably check up on ours.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (long sigh) That is true. We haven't heard anything, but that is true.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We haven't heard anything about him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's terrifying.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's probably okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who are we talking about? (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jarett.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Our only friend in Draconia.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I personally would assume that Tiberius would either be on his way to one of the two cities, if he were so inclined. And if he had survived. And if he wasn't working in the city itself to keep it functioning.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's hard-headed enough. So all of those things are very true.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And again, we're at war. This is not a battle. We do not win by going to Draconia. We do not win by going to Marquet. We win months from now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're starting to make less and less sense, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No! I'm making perfect sense.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Part of the traditional Whitestone breakfast is--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A rambling de Rolo.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think you got that backwards?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Vote, then?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vote.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm all right with a vote.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, all in favor of going to Marquet to find a Vestige that will maybe give us some more power that we need to kill a dragon, say aye!

lines.name: TALIESIN, LIAM
lines.text: Aye.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All in favor of going to Draconia, where we don't really have a great plan but I think we're going to go try to fuck up a dragon's lair and maybe rescue five people and probably die as lizard people, say aye.

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS, SAM
lines.text: Aye.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aye.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've changed my mind. I want to go to Marquet now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three to three.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry. Oh shit! I didn't mean to fuck that up. Trinket, what's your vote?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hold on, let's see if Ashley texts in the next ten minutes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three versus three. Are you going leave it up to the dice, being a game of DND?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where's that coin we have?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have it. I have it right here. Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You could also do one to ten and 11 to 20.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One or 20. Ready?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, we're just doing one flip?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. What?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. It's flipped!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is what?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay! 20 is Marquet and a one is Draconia.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What about all the other numbers?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's only two! It's a coin!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20, Marquet. One is Draconia.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And any other number, we stay home.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to Draconia, and we're going to see if we could find Tiberius.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let it be known, I don't think we should go as lizard people anymore.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we should go as ravaged Draconians.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we should go as Draconians.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can make ourselves look like dragonborn with Seeming?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that's a better plan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At least that way, they'll trust us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't have to teleport to the middle of nowhere. Well, we do need to get farther away from here. Is there any way to get farther away from where we are right now before we--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can we get back to Umbrasyl's lair? I thought that was a good idea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could go there and there and back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, as long as we commit to 24 hours in Draconia no matter what.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can go to Umbrasyl's lair, but it'll take an extra day, because I can only teleport us so many times.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think 72 hours is a perfectly reasonable amount of time to dedicate to this prospect.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pop in, scry, pop into Draconia, look around and next day, pop out. Can we do that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If we stop at Umbrasyl's lair, is there anything we can do to run Grog out like a labrador? I'm worried about him not getting enough playtime in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In Draconia?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, in the mansion. Can you bamf up anything for him in the mansion?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're talking about tonight?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. We're going to go camp somewhere for a day, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we're going to Draconia.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Go to the black dragon lair, then go to Draconia, then spend a night

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've been travelling with these fuckers for years, and I still don't understand magic.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hold on a second. We have two choices if we're going to Draconia: we can either go to Umbrasyl's lair to scry from there, then teleport there, which means we will be staying the night in Draconia.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In Draconia?

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: In Draconia.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or we go to Draconia right now, blindly, and then I'd still have a spell to get us out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But they could track us back here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How can we go there blindly if you don't know where a tree is?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I'd scry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then they'd know where

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They could theoretically, if we get caught.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We would only scry on a tree. We wouldn't scry on a dragon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have a compromise.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Actually, can I just throw this out? The only thing that would detect us scrying is currently flying over the ocean. We can scry right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's scry from the giant's cave outside the city.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It'll still take a couple of hours to get there, though?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's nine. It's seven--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's 5:00 in the morning!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's 3am! Why are we awake?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still drunk somehow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We get far enough outside of the city so at the very least--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To the giant's lair! To scry!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: North of the city, up into the beginning stages of the Alabaster Sierras, you find the abandoned fortress that is there, embedded on the side of the mountain wall. Keyleth, you are attempting a scrying spell? What are you scrying on?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I have the map of Draconia, let me just see if I can scry--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know what you know in Draconia? Do you know what you

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, we don't know if he's in Draconia.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We may end up somewhere random.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's true. but what do you know what is in Draconia?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know of the things that Tiberius has told us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you know any of his friends or his family? Have we met his family?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have not met his family. You've never been there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't need to have a known location, right? I can just scry in a general area, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You need generally a creature of some kind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What about his little pet?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you not scrying on a tree?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Lockheed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Lockheed has a higher chance of being dead than Tiberius.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that's underestimating, or overestimating-- I don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a coin flip.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a coin flip, really. He's small.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, this could answer our question. If I can't find anybody, then we might be going to Marquet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Go for it, then. See what happens.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I guess it's Tiberius, then? He's all I got. It's got to be someone that I know? It can't be something I've heard about?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It can be something you've heard about. A person or a creature.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A person or a creature, not a place?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not necessarily, no.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can it be a magic object?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would be a creature of some kind.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We know about Tiberius. We know about Kruvanis Stormwind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We know of Lockheed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fucking magic!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what he just said!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we gambling on Tiberius being there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're going to gamble on Tiberius?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am gambling on whoever we scry to, because they could all be dead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How many times can you scry?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Theoretically, four times.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've also got a Scrying Stone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Start with the stone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's right, you've got that goddamn thing. Give me the stone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we should call it rock. The Rock.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It doesn't go away, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. it's a Scrying Eye. You can use it once a day.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Let's do this!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Start with Tiberius.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Start with Tiberius. We'll work our way down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Start with Tiberius.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was going to bring it out!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, you did wonderfully.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was just sitting there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take the object. You close your eyes, focusing on the memory and the life essence of Tiberius Stormwind. You project your thoughts into the ether. The nature energies carry you into the darkness, and there is no response.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No response?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No response. The scrying spell finds no target.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That can mean a lot of things.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, does that stretch across the planes?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Generally, it's on the same plane of existence.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. What about his father?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or Lockheed?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, Lockheed would be with--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not necessarily. How many times have we found stray cats?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's true. Maybe scry on Lockheed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I try it? Will it expend another spell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one will expend a spell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It lasts for ten minutes? Oh, per spell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So you're burning your own spell slot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm burning my own spells.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At least you got one for free.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thanks, Vex.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It makes me very nervous.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should do his dad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That would be who I would kill if I were taking over the city.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You just want to kill everybody.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to try Lockheed. His dad could be in a place where he's being watched.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So this time, you give the object back to Vex and you sit down and create the ritual space before you. You sit down in the center of the stone floor of the fortress and you close your eyes. This time, you send out your consciousness once more. The druidic energies carry you an extended distance in but a few moments, and your vision clicks in and you see, perched against a snow-covered rock in the inside of a ravine, a shivering, small, green dragonling. Alone, and is partially asleep against the stone. You can see just past over this large, gaping ravine that is the center of this portion of Wildemount, you can see scattered rubble covered in ice and snow and small distant things you can't quite make out with your vision here occasionally moving through it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you see any trees?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I find any trees?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And as you glance up, there is a very thick tree that is currently jutting out the side of the mountain.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does it appear to be natural?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And large enough to fit Grog?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Maybe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jutting out the side of--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It's not sitting on ground, but is currently over the ravine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, one of those. Any other trees? Is this the biggest or closest one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's all you can make out from this perspective.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How big is the ravine? How deep is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From where you can tell right now, from the perspective you can see, looking at Lockheed, it's probably a good 50-foot fall before you hit a scattering of broken rock, and eventually it comes into a grade to the bottom of the ravine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not great.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not a good option.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys have fallen 50 feet and been fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Someone has Feather Fall, right? No?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did it look like a natural cavern or a man-made cavern that Lockheed was in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From what you can tell, it looks natural.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like he found a little cave and is hiding?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's less of a cave and more he's perched on this little alcove, this little outcropping of rock on the side of the ravine wall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, he's on the side of the ravine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On the side of the ravine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I have an idea. What if we tie a rope on something on this side and we all go out of the rope really fast and drop down?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Grog first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should you scry one more time, for the dad? Because best-case scenario, we're in a weird, snowy ravine with no civilization around.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't want to be around any civilization. And also, that's one more spell gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did see, distant, blurred from your perspective, since the focus of the scry was on Lockheed, you did see movement and very small distant objects within the snow at the base of the ravine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They could potentially see us as soon as we come out of the tree.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we'll be far away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They could be citizens, they could be creatures? I just saw movement of figures, I didn't see any details?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seems like a good plan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is risky.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is ridiculous.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's true. There's only risk at this point. Is this the risk we make or is this not the risk we make. Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, are we asking for Grog's opinion now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Only so that we can ignore it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're the one that was most adamant about us going there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With the new data, how do you feel?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think we should take the hint and not go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you said--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but I was picturing meandering out of a nice, beautiful tree in a forest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a little jolt. It's a little fall. It's fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's it. He created this idea and he's backing out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You told us your famous phrase: all risk! That's what this is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do hate to have my own words used against me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All risk. That's what this is! We are doing all risk!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm down to party. I'm just saying it was a little different in my head.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've never known you to be a coward, Grog.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No! Why would you do that?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why, Scanlan?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll go first. You hold my hand, and I'll go first.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He can play the fiddle very well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll go. Let's do it. I'm ready.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, before we go through, I'm going to cast Pass Without a Trace on us so we can stealth through the tree. Like that's going to work.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, that's a good idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are there trees around us that we can go through right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A short walk, you could get down to the base of the forest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. I'm going to tie the rope off onto a very sturdy thing next to a tree that we're going to go through.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to rappel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does the portal only close after a couple seconds?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. Six seconds. We're all going to hold on to the rope and we all go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six seconds for all of you to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jump out!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bungee-jumping out of a tree!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are fucking idiots!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is the stupidest--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is a terrible plan. I want to go on record for saying I was against this plan--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can just leave really quick! She's got another teleport, yeah. We're going to climb up to the tree--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I didn't see Draconia, did I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've never seen Draconia before.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But did I see a city in my scry?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You saw no city.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You saw rubble.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Once again, Lockheed could have flown miles away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He could have.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We jump back in the tree, we come back. 15 minutes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But there's things that were crawling around amongst the dead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They were far off in the distance!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I'm all right with doing this, if we're doing this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, sweet. I am, too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, fuck it! Let's do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So you've affixed the rope at the base of the strongest tree you can find.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we going to tie ourselves to each other again, like before?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! Because that's dumb. We're going to break our backs. I'm going to cast Pass Without a Trace on everyone right now because why the fuck not?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You got a fucking broom. I'm hopping on the broom.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, I'm on the broom. And he's on the broom.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vex, we're going to have the greatest I-told-you-so if we survive this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. We have Vex and Scanlan on the broom.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should you make me some something teensy?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, this is such a stupid idea...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, we're going to need every spell we need in there. No, you're the weight that's going to hold the rope down, you're going first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Any of your spell prep?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to pop my wings out and hook my arms under Kiki's armpits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm holding on the rope, because I'm an idiot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Grog and Percy holding onto the rope.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is stupid. This is so stupid!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I hate you all.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But this is really stupid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, what are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I cast Transport Via Plants on that big, fatty tree!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth touches the edge of the tree, the rope which is affixed to above. The trunk (portal opens).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Everyone ready?

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: Go!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I fly through stealthily.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You fly through stealthily.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm trying to get down to the ground quickly and hide behind something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. I would like all of you guys to make stealth checks at disadvantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes! That's awesome.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's not too bad.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pass Without a Trace?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As Vex and Scanlan scoot first through the opening, you coast down, and there is a cluster of rocks, but there's a light snowdust, and you find a snowbank that you guys coast down to quickly. You can decide to float above the snowbank. What do you want to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We get down on the ground and go under.

lines.name: MATT
