lines.text: Okay, so you disappear under the snowbank. It is freezing cold, the wet immediately falling snow against your form begins to seep in. But you are below eye-level. Vax and Keyleth? You guys just dart through, you holding her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fly through, and then once I see them hit the ground, I'm going to dive-bomb us, and I'm going to wrap us in a little wing bubble and roll into the snow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It picks up and as you hit, whipping past the 15 feet of jagged rocks that were gathered at the base of the ravine, you scoot over it, the wings fold in around you, and you guys tumble into the snow. Make an acrobatics check with disadvantage because you're grabbing onto her and are covered in wings.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And you're covered in wings.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I rolled a 15 and a 20. That would be a 30.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two of you jump through and start rappelling down, Grog at the bottom end. Bringing the rope, bringing the rope down, bringing the rope down. It slams shuts, the rope cuts at the other end as the portal closes. Percy, you just make it out as the rope gives way. It is now Grog and Percy plummeting toward the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I cast a Grasping Vine to grab Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't have the opportunity, because this all happens in a period of six seconds and you guys just landed and coasted in the snow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Am I right under Percy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's about five feet ahead of you, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to let that happen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're cushioning his fall?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Make an acrobatics check, just for the hell of it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I love this game.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13. As soon as you look over your shoulder and see the ground coming, you try and swing your legs underneath to catch you, to slide across. And you begin to. Your feet catch the rock and you feel the muscles tense. Your back gets jammed a little bit. And you catch Percy in your arms, but the momentum of Percy hitting you sends you back over, and you both tumble into the snow. You do prevent Percy from taking any damage, but you do suffer five points of fall damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stubbed your toe, big guy?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I got a booby.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is Lockheed within range still? Can we see him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys make a perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I look, too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're just now getting up out of the ball of wings.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25. You do see Lockheed is about 50, 60 feet up on the rock right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where's Lockheed?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I whisper in Draconic? Lockheed! And whatever the word is for "Come to me."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seems too far to really be within earshot of a whisper.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I see her doing this. I point to him, and I cast Message, and I say: Lockheed! We're down here! Come down! It's us, your friends!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lockheed (wingbeats) and then glides against the rock. And glides lower to the rock. Glides lower to the rock, and flies up-- still keeping a cautious distance from you above the snow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tibs. We're friends with Tibs. Tiberius. You remember us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see Lockheed a little closer now. You remember him being fairly sick when he was initially purchased. While the illness has passed, he looks greatly malnourished and thin--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I pull out some of my food that I give to Trinket and try to feed it...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as you pull out the food, Lockheed's demeanor changes immediately. Darts up and almost latches onto your hand and causes you to jump--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I cast Speak With Animals. Is he an animal?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have Speak With Small Beasts...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not a beast.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fuck you! (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's a little small monster.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I would have known, as a dragon expert, that he's not a fucking animal, then. Whatever.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is a monster?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hit your head in the fall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't fall, I flew.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pike's a small monster.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just grab him and put him in the bag of holding!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point now, the temperature's really set into you. You've heard stories. You're familiar with the sound. The words you've heard of Wildemount, being largely a colder continent, especially to the north where the actual civilizations of man exist. Draconia's a little further to the south, but also based on the information you have, this being taken recently as the den of Vorugal, there is an almost perpetual small snowstorm that is existing about this ravine, and the wind itself is beginning to cut through. Thankfully, you're mostly armored up. For the time being, you're fine. But you can see where this is a difficult weather pattern to perpetually live in. Lockheed finishes eating vigorously and seems to be waiting across your hand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Perch him on my shoulder and get out some more of the little boar meat we have in the bag of colding and feeding him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He eats some, happily.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I speak Draconic to him, see if he understands any of that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you say?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tiberius was teaching him Draconic.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I know. I say "Where is Tiberius?" in Draconic.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where is home?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where is home?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (croaking)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Unless Tibs got further along with him, it was one word--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He was teaching him "sit" and "play dead" and stuff.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One word at a time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. Stay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And stays and digs in the talons at the top of your leather armor shoulder, folds thed wings in and just waits there, huddled up against your shoulder for warmth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to look around and see if there's a direction in which it seems there's civilization or any signs of battle or otherwise.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see pillars that are jutting out of portions of this. You see partially and mostly collapsed buildings that themselves have been destroyed from serious impact. You recall, during the initial attack of the Conclave, that one of the things that was seen through a vision was the fall of Draconia, which were islands of stone that were held aloft through arcane means within this ravine. What you now look upon are all the fallen remains of each of these arcane islands now plummeted, crushed, and fell into the ravine and have been sundered and destroyed. You do see figures moving quickly and crawling over elements of it, and you see a cluster of them fighting over something and then disperse.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're probably a good 300 feet off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could we tell what kind of creatures they are?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They appear to be humanoid, somewhat reptilian.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should I make us lizard people?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do a nature check to see if I can see the origin, the epicenter of the storm? Like the eye of the storm? Where it's coming from?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Clever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16. Best that you can view, the storm seems to be slowly spiraling, and a large heavy portion of the snowfall and sleet is hitting about a mile or so towards the right side of the ravine that you guys are looking at. From the wall you're at, you have the right and the left sides of this current ravine structure, seems to be that direction, about a mile.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think the dragon's lair is that way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you look around for more trees that aren't so hard to get to in case we need to make a fast getaway?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We could just keep our eyes open.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You said it was a mile. Can we traverse through the bottom of the ravine to get there in that direction?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or is it all water?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you can.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going to crack out the good old Dust of Tracelessness since there's knee-high snow?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's not be fleshy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You want me to make us Draconians or lizard people?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If we're lizard people, Draconians will not trust us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. We can at least pretend to cower and be afraid of lizard men if we see them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think Grog can cower.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is the definition of this word?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Be a wussy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know when you bang your balls on a rock or something? It's like that, you go, (groans).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there anything you're not good at? Don't think that hard. Never mind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Draconians?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Draconians.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will cast Seeming on the party and make us all Draconians.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What kind of Draconians? There are many types of colors, there are those with and without tails--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wasn't Tiberius a strange one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't do red!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He was a strange one, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He was the odd man out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They didn't take kindly to him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Metallic, yeah?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bronze?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like gray, silver?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe it's good to make us silvers and whiteish!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bronze, silver, and gold then, I guess.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's chromatic. Metallic! Bronze, silver, gold.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we'll do the Olympics.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With or without tail? Because you've met both.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They won't actually be tails. That might actually get us in trouble.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which one was Tiberius?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tiberius had a tail.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do most of them have a tail?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gern didn't have a tail and he was less than-- I don't think Draconians will like us without a tail.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keeping your normal attire, just on the top of the Draconian form?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No! What do Draconians wear?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Rags! Put us in rags, like we've been living in rubble.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Raw silk and tattered clothes, just rags, terrible gray things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Make us look like we've been beat up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In a different place on our face. Everyone's got one face bruise in a different place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of your forms shift into that of various metallic dragonborn, with tails, adorned in rags, dirty. What do you do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit, who all speaks Draconic here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're all mutes. We're lepers and mutes, and you are our doctor?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (gasping)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (speaking in Japanese)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't actually speak Japanese, Grog.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're moving towards the epicenter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys step up out of the snow and begin walking?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Stealthily.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm stealthily leading us. That direction, towards where the lair is?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keeping an eye out for trees.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And for any of the lizard creatures coming towards us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now, no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then let's quietly make our way that direction.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Remember, like you've been hit in the balls.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys cluster up and begin stepping above the snow, which is still about waist, knee-high for some of you. Making your way to the right of your current location, towards the center of the storm that Keyleth discovered. As you guys begin to walk, a nearby pile of rock and rubble, there was that one cluster of four, five of these moving lizard-like entities. Suddenly, one of them looks at your group, looks back at the rest, and they all stand up and look over in your direction.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're our leader, friend. Do we continue?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're just watching you. They're not doing anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's injuredly keep walking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They go back to rummaging through. You guys continue to walk. The ravine curves to the right, or at least begins to open up further to the right and you're met with the next large structure of rubble. What you saw was the edge of an extremely large, once-floating island, now crushed and sundered across the ground. There are sheets of ice across parts of it. You can see the better part of a large palace or library that is now caved in partially. You can see frozen books scattered across portions of the stone and rock on the ground before you. You can see a series of huts have been constructed on top of this rubble, and there are some small fires lit, little plumes of smoke and probably two dozen dragonborn figures that are currently combing through the rubble.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we see any books that seem interesting as we're walking through them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're underneath ice. You can try and chisel some out, if you like.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't have time!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A lot of it's covered in snow. There's some bits you can peek through and see sheets of ice and frozen books--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are there any frozen bodies?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you begin to have a closer book as you walk by, there are many frozen bodies. You see many people, all dragonborn, some atop the rubble, some partially crushed, some partially locked in ice, some destroyed by some sort of an acidic substance. Some of them are covered in boils, and their face is locked in some sort of horrible coughing fit. This was a very terrifying battle scene that has transpired here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That means Raishan was here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That means Thordak was here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Umbrasyl was here. Acid.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They attacked the cities as a horde.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are no signs of anyone burned.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought you said ash.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The people that are scouring through the rubble, are those dragonborn or just the lizard people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Best that you can tell right now, it appears to be dragonborn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we look at their behavior and see what it looks like they're doing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would like to join that insight check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I would not like to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will join that insight check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll join in, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've already said no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 13. This isn't having to do with dragons? So it's 13.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't do insight checks too often, I'm sorry. 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did you roll or not?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I rolled a ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're scouring through the ruins, trying to find anything of worth. Some of it's finding wood and throwing it onto these little flame pyres that are scattered around the ruins. You begin to look and see that actually the sides of the ravine, there are hundreds of small caverns are carved into the rock. Not quite like a dense honeycomb style, but it looks like there is an entire cave city that lives within this ravine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And they're not frozen over?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some of them are covered in snow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But snow, not blasted with ice?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They look like they're in use?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some of these dragonborn, they're coming out of their huts. Some of them are still looking up at the sky nervously. They look over and see you guys approaching and a voice calls out, "Who goes there?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Friends. Friends of Stormwinds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Friends of Stormwind, you say? We have friends of Stormwind. Approach."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I walk up injuredly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm hobbling up behind.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm cowering.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys cower and approach. Keyleth, Vax, and Vex, you notice as you approach that a number of the people that have all stopped and are paying attention are beginning to move around and encircle you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pardon my friends, their tongues have been cut out by our captors. I'm all that's left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you walk forward you can see the figure that's talking to you, a very tall, burly, bronze-scaled dragonborn, long horns that protrude down the back in a slow curvature. No tail. In fact, you now notice that every single one of the dragonborn you've noticed here have no tail.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We had a 50-50 chance!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Friends of Stormwind. That would make you Sky-walkers. I see your tails. You survive the "onslaught and step into the den of those you persecuted. Well, what are your last words?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This was a great plan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Drop it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know what's going on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is this all being said in Draconic?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's Draconian! I don't know what's happening.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know what, I don't know what to tell you. Everyone with a tail's an asshole. We got what was coming to us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He turns his head to the side a bit. (spits) "What skills do you have?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can shoot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Is that all?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He makes boots.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's a skill."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's really good at stonecraft.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All the other dragonborn that come behind you are now holding spears, some of them rudimentary-looking pikes that are just held up and pointed in your direction. You guys are now enclosed by about two dozen dragonborn. "Here are your choices: You die here like the scum you are--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Choice B.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You will join the rest of your ilk, and you will seek food for us. You will know what it's "like to be bent beneath the knee of those who do not deserve it. Put them in chains!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, they're going to know, as soon as we're in chains.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, we're going to have a fight here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, shall we drop Seeming? Perhaps we should drop Seeming?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? Is it going well?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They approach, and stop for a second. A few of the folks who came over and went to grab for chains have stopped and are holding them in their hand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have to tell you something. We're not actually Draconian.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He leans in and gives you this very keen look now, and takes a few steps closer. He's about five feet from you now. "From where I stand, you look pretty fucking Draconian to me."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we have some really good magic users with us. Look, forgive us for making tails. We don't know anything about your culture. We're idiots! We came here because we know you're under attack, and we're trying to help.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And you just wander into the caves of the Ravenites, dressed in the face of those that broke "our backs?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yep, because we're stupid!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check with disadvantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Disadvantage. Not good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14? "Bring the chains. You have ten seconds to prove--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Drop Seeming, just drop it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Really? It's one of my better spells.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, I'm sorry!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, poof. We're back to normal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of your images fade. Everyone takes a step back. The spears come up even further, and there's a little pause.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My tail's gone! Bummer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, believe me, you don't want the tail.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I enjoyed it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does this make things better or worse for us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I repeat him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the reactions you get from them, you gather most of these don't speak Common and none of them seem to understand what you're saying.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here's the thing. You're being attacked by a white dragon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The white dragon came, and he tore down the Sky-walkers."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So you're happy with it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, it's put us in a better position."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right. But now that the Sky-walkers have already been torn down, do you want to keep the dragon in charge?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We owe the dragon for the freedom that he gave us."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So you serve one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "For the time."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And he doesn't punish you at all? He's a good master?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Those who deserve punishment get it. But we hunt with it. It brings us power. It promises "expansion of the Ravenites, and we will no longer live under the boot of those in this countryside "and this continent."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How's it going?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We have children to feed. We have families of our own."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How can we help?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How can you help?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what we're here for.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Bring us food, bring us warmth, chop some firewood. Bring some trees. Work."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gladly. But not in chains. We do this freely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Give us your weapons, and you can walk freely."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's kill them all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sorry, that's not happening.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then leave."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That we will.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What is your business here, she who wanders in the faces of others?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a cool title.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, add that to the list. Our entire landscape is under attack. Now, Vorugal has helped you, but they've made many others suffer, not just Draconians. Entire cities brought down, for nothing. We're here to right the wrong and help in any way we can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You should talk to Tooma."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tooma.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tooma. It is not a tumor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We knew that was going to happen.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Took about 1.5 seconds to fuck with Matt's name.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think he

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it Tooma?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tooma. T-O-O-M-A.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's totally different.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who is Tooma?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tooma is our chieftain. I'm not to make this decision. Come. No chains, for now." They all stay with their spears still out in front, but they nudge you forward.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I explain everything that's happening in Common as we walk. Is everyone still cool with this? We're going to the chieftain.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just tell us when it's time to kill everybody.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We improvise. It's what we do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think this is actually going far better than I had hoped.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've got to get in, get out. We've got one day here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are there any trees that we can see as we're walking?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They actually said they wanted us to chop firewood, so if we can get sent on that mission, we're set.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, 19!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we in the mountains? No. Are we?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're in a ravine. Perception check was just for Grog, as he's the only one that asked to look for trees. But you rolled a 19?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I did!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking around, occasionally poking out of the rubble, you'll see a tree. Most of them seem to have not fared so well with the cold weather and have been snapped or broken in the process of the falling rubble. You do make out, towards the edge on the other side of the ravine, beyond this giant one, you can see this one island, one larger island of the cluster that made up Draconia, fell in the center here and is broken apart. On the far end, you can see there's a small cluster of trees, the hint of green still to them, some of them varying thickness.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could work with that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Might be a long way, though.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've been here, what, ten minutes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say about 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we're going to go see Tooma, or we're going to chop down some fucking trees?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have to go. They're walking us to the chieftain. Can't just walk away now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do see every now and then a few large spikes of ice that are jutting out of portions, and you see bodies that are jabbed onto the spikes and left to freeze.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do they have tails?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're led in for about five or so minutes. and you see other offshoot tunnels. It's like a giant anthill weaved throughout this, and you can see rudimentary furniture made of wood and stone, with limestone rock, whatever's available within the actual ravine here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I get a sense on when this was carved? If this was carved recently or if this has been here a while?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a nature check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh, 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Best you can tell from looking at the rock and knowing the amount of erosion versus the curvature of it, these tunnels have been here for a very long time. This portion opens up and you can see now there is a much more refined, village-type structure inside, maybe 30-plus small homes carved from rock and stone. Built much better than the makeshift huts that you saw outside. You also see a giant pile of broken chains to the left side of the entryway. Many of them are manacles and neck vices that are just thrown and discarded in this large pile.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tiberius never mentioned this side of Draconia.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you are brought into the center of this larger chamber you see two dozen Draconians that are out and about just currently gathering materials, talking and walking, and stop and see as you enter and just watch as you pass by. Colors range from metallic to chromatic, all spectrum; it's a mish-mash of all walks and sizes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And the chromatic-- the red, the blue, the green-- are we seeing tails on them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No tails.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nobody has tails down here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could make us all Draconian again without tails.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That would probably work at this point, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are led around the fountain and led to the inside. There, sitting on a large stone seat made of haphazard bits of rock and stone, it looks relatively uncomfortable, a large stone throne, there is a female dragonborn. She wears long, drab, gray robes, tattered at the edges, a hood loosely pulled back and a large scarf or wrap around her neck and shoulders. She just sits there with her hands over the side, draped, and as you walk in and your eyes adjust you can see that she looks very old. As you're brought in, the rest of your crew still pushes you in with the spears. She leans forward. "Are these prisoners of ours?" The dragonborn who brought you in goes, "They are, for the time being. They say they come here "because the Frigid Doom and other dragons who came are killing their people, as well. They have come "to fight the dragon, or so they claim. They walked in under guise of our enemy. It is your wisdom to "make these choices." And the larger dragonborn bows his head and steps away, the spears pull back and they step, blocking the exits that you walked through; the entire archway now is shoulder to shoulder dragonborn with spears at the ready.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tooma. We apologize for coming in the guise of your enemies. Unfortunately, we don't know much about your culture, and no one ever informed us of what you have suffered, and we apologize.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're saying this in Draconic, I assume? She leans in a bit, and the firelight crackles under her chin, and you can see the teeth on one side pull out beyond the lip, and it gives her this lopsided look. The tongue wipes across the front, and she leans in toward you. "You come here "to fight the Frigid Doom, you say?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I would be lying if I said it did not bring a chance for freedom to all of us Ravenites."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Much deserved.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But as time progresses, I fear we shake one bond to step into another. The dragon presented "itself as our savior, but has since required an ever-growing fealty."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Without the Draconians, without the Sky-walkers, and without the Doom, we would be "free. Rebuild our culture."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want nothing more for you than that. Let us help you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now, the rest of you hear this: "Do your friends speak Common?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that's lovely.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hi!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Much relieved. Yes, they do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog doesn't, but we do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (moans) (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If we are to let you go, do you promise to slay this creature?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We will do everything in our power to watch it die.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is our only purpose.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It has been gone for days."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It should be back very soon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Took most of its army with it."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog was right! He's always right!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was our hope, that we would be able to come here when it was at its weakest and get a sense of it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you know where its lair is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I do."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it far?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is not far, but one hour walk."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I roll an insight check on her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (gasps) Oh boy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you know what I like as much as whispers? Loot Crate.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? Taliesin. You've got to do better than that. Try something like this: You know, Matt's an asshole, but you know who's not? The good people at Loot Crate.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Loot Crate doesn't decide to just tell one person about what's going on. They let everyone know, not just Vex.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, you never told us what he whispered to you before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he didn't.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm a vampire. Just deal with it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you come here to kill this dragon, I assume you have the means and a plan."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We definitely have plans.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Totally have a plan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then let us set an ambush."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ambush? Sorry?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come again?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: While it did pay off, and its brother is dead, a lot of people died in the process. A lot. Very large, strong people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So what do you insist? We not have an ambush, we just wait for it to land and attack head-on?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We were going to use this opportunity to find our way into its lair and find its weaknesses, and plan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sabotage, from the inside.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's more than one dragon, and they are supporting each other.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We kill this one, it'll set off a chain reaction that we might not be able to recover from if we're not fully prepared.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We want to make the means to make sure that when the time comes, we can destroy them all in one fell swoop.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The risk here is that by destroying Vorugal--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Frigid Doom.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll bring the wrath of the others upon you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He is not the strongest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thordak is much larger, and I don't think he's been here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where do you come from?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everywhere.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're a motley crew.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lots of different places.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do not answer that question.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can answer the continent.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As you can see, we're half-elves.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We are to walk to the den. We are to learn your information. Then what?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Set up a situation where we can monitor you and possibly contact you when it's time, and even let you know if we think the dragon's about to leave, so that you can prepare.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have lived to see this day by not being deceived or tricked. You speak words that are not "direct. They wind. They spin. They circle. What guarantee do I have that you will not just flee?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To be fair, what guarantee do we have that you won't kill us, and the ambush was meant for us? I believe there is untrust on both sides.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As she pulls forward to walk straight to you, Keyleth, you see the somewhat clouded, cataract-ridden eyes of the dragonborn female Tooma. She comes up to you and goes, "We are a "proud people, even when pressed into the dirt for as many years as we have been. We reclaim our "honor. We reclaim our place in this world. We wish to do this as peacefully as possible, but we have "been forced to scrounge and survive through this freedom. We wish you no folly. We wish you no ill "will. But we also have learned that trust needs to be earned; it cannot be spoken and given so "freely. Both ways. You are right to mistrust, as are we of you. But that is the impasse. One must "have faith, in one way or another, if there is to be a compromise."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think faith and trust are not mutually exclusive. I can not trust you and still have faith, and you should not feel lack of pride for living in the dirt, or surviving. There's nothing wrong with that. But I understand your urge to want to rebuild, become the great culture that I know you all are. So you should at least trust that we have similar interests in the end.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh! 19!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Was that opal?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, it was.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Opal's back! 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25. She reaches forward and extends a finger that gently scrapes the bottom of the chin, not too much to hurt, but to go across the skin and pull your chin upward into the light of the fire a little bit. "There is much wisdom in there for so young a face. All right. There are not many "options we have, either. Come. We will walk. And at the very least, if you decide to flee, never return."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can give you that word.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tooma. Are the Frigid Doom's armies around? Will they see us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There are a handful of dregs that stayed behind, but you tell me you wear many faces."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We certainly don't want them to see ours.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What should we disguise ourselves as?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She points past, over your head, and goes, "Tiny gnome, the faces of those that lead you here."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The faces of your tribe, of your clan. All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Be glad you walk with one as wise."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is she talking about me? That's awesome!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She begins to shuffle over, and you watch as two of the dragonborn walk over and scoop her up shoulder to shoulder, and she shrugs them off and pushes them away. "I can walk myself." She begins shuffling, and they separate and open. She walks partway out as you guys stand there, and turns around and beckons. "Well, come."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We follow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you cast Seeming again?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can do Seeming one more time. All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, if you cast Seeming, will we still be able to get into the--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The larger dragonborn that let you in--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a cube. It's a tail cube.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the rest of the guards circle around and begin to walk, a little bit of trepidation, but going along with Tooma, the large one who let you in goes, "Tooma. Are you certain?" She turns around and goes, "Skork, there are few things that are certain in this world. I am not "long for it, but if we are not to seize the opportunity of kinship, we miss the opportunity "for survival. Is it a risk? Yes. Sometimes it's a risk worth taking." And she keeps walking. The rest of them gather behind, and the now-named Skork gives a nod and continues walking along.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have we heard of Skork?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that his name?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He was the guy that we talked to right when we got here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You guys are led out of the tunnel, back into the freezing air. The wind has picked up a bit, and you can now hear this low hum as it hits certain portions of the cavern and causes low vibrational whistles in the distance. The snow has begun to fall a little heavier now, and as you walk out, you can hear the crunch of your footsteps as you're stepping through heavier and heavier blankets of snow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I tell Tooma, as we walk out: P.S., if that dragon comes back, we need to bolt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She nods. "If that dragon comes back, we never saw you, you never saw us."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's very slow, by the way. Your passage of travel is about half speed as she leads the charge, but everyone respectfully keeps in pace with her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tooma, have you ever heard of a dragonborn named Gern Blanston?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She thinks for a second. "That name has not come to my mind, no."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Us neither.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pushing on, it's gotten a little lighter in the sky. You figure, based on your arrival, you may have just come in at the cusp of dawn, and the sun has now gotten higher in the sky. You're on the entire opposite side of the planet now, so the cycle has changed based on the location you're currently in. Well, you had rested, actually. You left in the morning. You would've gotten here-- actually, opposite of that. It's actually now getting to dusk. Even though it's only been a couple of hours of daylight that you've seen since you woke up this morning, it's already beginning to set, and the sky is getting darker.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We lost a day, but the dragon will still take the same amount of time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ugh. I'm so tree-lagged, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know. Always sucks going west to east.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're led over a portion of the ravine, ever so slowly, that lifts up, and then as you get to the crest, it bends down into a far deeper and wider portion of the ravine. This is now the center part of this entire giant physical anomaly that is this giant crack in the ground, and you can see the bulk of the fallen city is in the center of this area.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we see any big trees around here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see a couple of larger trees that sprout out from the rubble. There's ones that managed to survive the impact of certain areas of stone, though it looks like a lot of the bark has been stripped, and they might not be alive that you can see from this distance. There are smaller trees towards the edge, and a few still protruding from portions of the walls.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Note every tree as we walk by.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Now

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're led down into the ravine, you reach this central structure, and you can already see from this distance, as the snow falls, hitting and covering the rocks, there are dozens and dozens of those spikes of ice jutting out of the rock, each with one or two various frozen corpses impaled on them and left. At the top of this, you can see a large cluster of ice that is in a somewhat round gathering, and you can see-- actually, no, you don't see that. Sorry. A note that will come into play in the future.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I ask a question? The bodies on the spikes. None of them look familiar, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can keep watch as you go. You push towards the center of the ravine, and upon the large island of rubble, you begin to move, and it takes a good 40, 50 minutes, an hour, to traverse, a lot further than you would've expected in that time period. Sorry, a lot less than you figured you would traverse in that time, being weighed down by Tooma's gait. However, the rubble begins to subside, and you begin to see steps of ice. Not perfect, carved steps, but elements of encapsulated broken platforms of ice that act as stairs. Vax, Vex, and Keyleth, as you guys begin to move up the steps, and you especially, Vex, you can see, with what little bit of light is beginning to shine down through the ice, you can see mounds and mounds of coins and jewel boxes and many expensive knick-knacks and collections, all below feet of solid ice, all clustered towards the apex of this collapsed, ruined island.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tooma, is Vorugal having you collect all of this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Vorugal sends us to pay the debt we owe for being freed, yes. We scavenge. We spend our days "searching for food, for the means to survive, and finding what we can from the ruins of the broken "Draconia."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And when you can't find anything? What then?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "These are the thoughts that consume me. It is the reason you are still alive." Everyone make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, dog! 14!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That wasn't the golden snitch?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I put the golden snitch away for the evening.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Giving up on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys begin to approach, you can see now the ice that encases the golden coins begins to ripple upward, and it's getting harder and harder to climb. You can see now, it comes to an apex in this bowl-like formation, and as you get to a point where it's harder to ascend, you can see Tooma stops and sees that she can't go much further, and she points up and goes, "That is "where it sleeps. That is where we come to give what we find. And that is where it should fall."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is its nature? Is it vain? Does it want you to bow before it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It does not ask for kneeling. It asks for fear and respect. It asks us to bring the most "powerful creatures in the land for it to chase."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I roll an insight check on her again? Jesus. This is creepy. 27.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So the box is full of loot?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it's a crate, Liam.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The crate is full of boxes?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. A crate full of boxes. Box Crate, our best sponsor. Inside the boxes are tinier boxes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: When do you get to the loot, though?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it's a Russian nesting doll of boxes and crates.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Box-box.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Box-box, and then inside is a box-crate, and inside that is tiny-bag-crate.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are you guys talking about?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Liam! Do you want all those boxes?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I need boxes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Crate-crate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So. "This is its home. This is its shrine."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Check for fucking traps before we go in there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it up? Is it down? Is it through?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The top comes into this giant bowl, this platform of ice, and it's almost like a nest where it sits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A big icy dog bed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: By the way, we've been in dragons' lairs before, and the lairs themselves do things, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, with the dragon in them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But when the dragon's not in them they don't do anything?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My sister and I are going to have a look around. I have a question for you, though. If we make a stand here today, in theory, is it worth it to you to stand with us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you feel confident. Otherwise, we walk to our death prematurely."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, let's not do that today. This is reconnaissance.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If all goes well, we will have one more conversation.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. I'm going to start searching the ground for traps.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do have one other question: The bodies on the spikes. How did that happen? What was that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We did not join in, out of fear, and out of not knowing which side would come out. Vorugal stayed "behind as the other two flew. The dragon asked us why we do not fight. We said, 'Because it is not "'our place.' The dragon said, 'Well, your place is now that of free kin.' The dragon summoned forth "these spikes, and drove it through the hearts of many of the Sky-walkers. Many of us cheered, for "it was a symbol that many had wished to see for a long time, but at the same time, the older ones of "us... It was not what we wanted. It was not how we wished to be freed. But we had no way of stopping "him. As time went on, and with each surviving Sky-walker that was found, there were no more "cheers. Just the dread of knowing that maybe in time, when all the spikes are filled, it may be us "on them next."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 29. Looking for any traps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You spend the next 15 minutes or so, 20 minutes, skirting around the outside of this large frozen bowl, looking for some semblance of a set trap. You don't recognize anything as any sort of mechanism placed that would set off your warning defense systems as a rogue.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I stand on the top and look out from the platform and see what is visible from the platform and what areas seem hidden in the landscape?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to join you on that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of you guys roll perception checks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have an idea.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural fucking 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't even need to look. Good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You both saw that, right? That just fucking happened. This is not my normal die. This is something I bought at Comic Con.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, it's not the dice anymore. We know that you've somehow gained the favor of some Aztec deity that's trying to reclaim its foothold in the current-day pantheon through you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sumerian, you asshole.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would be Sumerian.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm bringing a shrine to Burning Man, by the way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, this is pertaining to dragons!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nevertheless, between the two of you keeping an eye out, through this Marduk Enki-loving fool over here--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bless you for knowing a Sumerian deity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look off and see that most of it, and its design here is to be a sentry point. The reason it's built over the structure is it has a view of the entirety of this central open valley in the ravine. There are nooks and crannies. There are elements of ice that can be carved away. There are small alcoves that could be out of sight, lower beyond the ice steps and such, but there is no extremely visible pockets or things that are completely out of the visual sight from that perch. It was designed specifically to be a place to survey everything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are there other perches?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From what you can see here? There are outcroppings of stone and elements that jut out naturally from the valley wall, but it's a wide berth from each side.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does this seem like the only thing, or would there be other sentry points, as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If flown to and held in, yeah. There are a couple of other rock areas where the dragon would be able to hold himself, but this is definitively--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is this the highest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which one?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The highest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The highest point.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So we have a really good vantage right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From here, yeah. This is the highest point in the ravine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we see the orb? Do we see an orb?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I help?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're all looking.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There we go. See? That wasn't great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nine!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing. Scanlan, you dart down and begin peering up against the ice walls that surround it. Going down into the actual scooping bowl of this dragon nest, and looking down, you can see a little glimmer of light that refracts at a different angle than the rest of the ice. A spherical surface is visible about two and a half feet below.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Do we smash it? Do we use it to make a crank call? What do we do with it? Steal it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They'll be able to scry on us for sure if we steal it. They see us. The minute we looked into Brimscythe's.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could do a Vorugal voice and say: Thordak, you're a cock!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't actually know his voice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could say: Thordak, I'm in desperate need of pay!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you speak dragon?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I guess you'll have to do that. What do we do? Do we break it so he can't communicate with the outside? That way when we kill him, he can't call for help.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If we do, then we violate what we said we were going to do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What did we say we would to do? I have a great idea for how to kill this fucker.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have a great idea of how to kill it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I have an idea. Tooma told us that they bring animals to hunt. We could be one of those animals and draw it to a certain spot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And draw it to a certain spot?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where we kill it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With our...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With our army of fucking Draconians and our ice thing that we've shaped into some sort of a trap.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I get a distinct impression that it is not impressed by ice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fire trap. Rock trap.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you're saying this out loud amongst the crew, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The ears have walls.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And also, you're right in front of the scrying circle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's buried by ice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's buried by ice, but that doesn't mean it doesn't work.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as you called them Draconians, there were a few hisses from the nearby crew.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Ravenites.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do they speak Common?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Some of them do. We spoke to them in Common.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We spoke to Tooma in Common.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's make a plan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just did. I made a plan. It's an ambush plan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, and then we go home and the dragons are at war. Then what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do you mean, the dragons are at war? There's only two more dragons at that point. We killed three-fifths of them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is something we've been told over and over.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does that even mean? We've already attacked two dragons. There's been no war.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Once one more is dead, they'll probably all attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Attack what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They'll stop playing nice. They'll start destroying.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have to kill them at some point.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, and now is not that point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The greatest plan we have is what Grog came up with, which is pitting them against each other.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, so how do we use this orb to do that right now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we have to use the orb?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's why we came here!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We came here to find out what its lair looked like.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What we are going to need is we need to sneak you in there, and we need you to take a movement.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does that mean?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A poo, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't do it anymore.

lines.name: LAURA, LIAM
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I used my last magic poo to look at my daughter.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What a sentence! What a sentence.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In every aspect, Scanlan, disgusting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the next t-shirt.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's amazing. I used my last magic poo to look at my daughter!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I need to know where she is. I need to know she's okay. Gilmore can maybe make me some more potion, but I haven't wanted to bother him about it because he's busy keeping a shield around Whitestone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You didn't say that out loud. You did not just say that out loud.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I said it in an accent.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was out loud.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. Hang on. Let's think about this for a minute.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we just step away from the orb while we talk?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, let's do that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're not near the orb. We're near the Draconians, aren't we?

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA
lines.text: Ravenites.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They walked you here and they're basically watching you set up for this ambush preparation or gathering. They're not going to leave you to your own devices. They're still not quite sure of everything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we sketch what it looks like? I think you should sketch, Percy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We need to use this opportunity. We're never going to be in this dragon's lair again! This is it. Crack the thing. Set a trap. Burn it down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a suggestion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, Grog, you're the best.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The white dragon is primal, right? He likes to hunt creatures. We've got to go now. We leave. We leave them alone. That way we're not in danger, they're not in danger. We promise to come back, not only with forces to help remove the white dragon, but also with something for it to hunt. That way we're not fighting it in its fucking lair.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We know a lot already.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can pretend to be a beast.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Scanlan, why would you bother to pretend to be a beast? If he just finds you, he'll hunt you and kill you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We know what his lair looks like, which we don't want to be in when we fight him. And we know how to get him out of it, possibly. It's a pretty successful trip.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One possibility is we could come back with Galdric, and he and I could play bait.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Galdric is the wolf, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's a big fucking wolf.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've made allies. We've got a look at everything. We know the terrain, and we know the political terrain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe Urukat would want to come and fight a dragon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He might.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will also add that we can leave them with something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what I was thinking. Maybe this isn't about destroying something. Maybe it's about planting something. If we destroy anything, the dragon's going to immediately blame the locals.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What would we leave? I don't want them able to scry on us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How about a little wine?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How about a small grove of trees?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could leave trees.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They did want trees.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could leave trees, too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We also have this Scrying Eye. Can I use this remotely?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you have to have it in your hands to utilize it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's all right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like the tree idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tooma, just in case something happens and a big red dragon comes to pick a fight, everyone hide. Get out of the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I appreciate the advice. I can guarantee you there would be no other course of action."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we carve in the lair "Thordak was here" or something?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They'll know it was you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we got the information--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tooma. Forgive me, I'm not the best speaker, but we have learned from fighting these dragons that if we fight them in their lair, we are at a severe disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then get it from its lair."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We are of a mind on that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What kind of creatures do you offer to it for hunt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is growing bored with dire beasts. We've even brought it to the ocean, where there were "some great terrors beneath the sea, but it tore them asunder. There are, northward, large "segmented insect-like creatures they call the remorhaz. That was a scuffle, but I fear the "dragon grows bored."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Got to go find us a beast and bring it here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I've got a better idea.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Spit it out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Once we've gathered some resources, when we return, we prepare to attack post-hunt. Once it has exhausted itself on something large and angry, that is when we strike the dragon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How will we be able to communicate with them, for them to let us know?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll be here the whole time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: When we come back, we stay until it's time. When we come back, it is to end this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For now, we leave a back-door entrance.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With the trees, we will know how to return quickly with a force.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This might be something we go to the Slayer's Take for. They always have a roster of big beasts.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With a little bit of information, we could even keep them informed of things for it to kill that they may find around here, with the Slayer's Take's help. We can keep you in supply of things to amuse it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I trust you know what you say. These words mean nothing to me."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are sorry that this cannot end as quickly as would be agreeable. We can do our best to help make you comfortable, and if you need some proof of the power that we wield, we can offer a token. I have a thought. But if you wish, a token of our power.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Eight days."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow. That's soon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can send a beast before, perhaps, but our travel is long. We may need more time. We have two more continents.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How much time do you need?"

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Two weeks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Two weeks?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Continents. Further than you have walked in your life. We move quickly, but there is only so much that can be done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Two weeks. 14 sun cycles past. If we do not hear from you, the Frigid Doom is known to this "Whitestone you speak."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fucking shit balls, Scanlan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're extorting us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not extorting. Making sure you are of your word, because otherwise you leave us here to die "on promises that are fake and false."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To-may-to, to-mah-to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good. Then we'll see you before two weeks is out."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I will leave you with a parting gift. I will leave you with a grove of trees that should be ever-growing and present.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you do that, he'll know something is different.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He will.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. We plant one tree.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, we have to plant some trees. Find a place that is secret.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can plant these trees anywhere. Just need solid ground.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you can get away from the city--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can possibly do it subterranean.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There is solid ground here. Up there, above the ravine, wherever else you need it to be."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where does the dragon not tread? Where do you know he will not see the trees?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Probably out of the ravine. He stalks inside quite extensively."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's find a place. This will be where we leave, anyway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tooma. I have one more question about Gern Blanston. I raise the hand cone, and I cast Modify Memory on her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh no. Oh jeez. Oh man, I love it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look at Matt's face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're about to get attacked.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, we're about to run.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I roll my initiative in advance?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There we go. All right, what's the DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you trying to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm trying to change the moment that I said "Whitestone" into "Emon."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as she leans in, and she shakes her head for a minute and goes, "What was your "question? I do not know these words you speak."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Candles. Have you ever met a candle-maker?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know not of a candle-maker."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do have a request on our way out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What is your request?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Would the dragon notice if any of these bodies were disturbed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Many, yes. But small amounts... why? If you wish to take what they have, they mean nothing to "us. One or two turned over will make no difference to the dragon."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pull that one down, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right." She points to it. Some of the Ravenites come over and haul one of the corpses off of the spike. It breaks off and snaps, and they bring it and throw it to the ground and step back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you. (sighs) It is exactly what I expect, I would assume.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The robes are familiar. The scale color is familiar.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I look it over. I check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There, locked in the moments of valiant defense of his city, frozen and lost, the remains of Tiberius Stormwind, left a hero defending his people, defaced by Vorugal the Frigid Doom.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's bring him inside, at least.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I go and I gather the remains.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are stiff and frozen, but light enough for you to carry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where are we taking him?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know. The remnants of the library, perhaps. The ground's too hard to bury.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can't even pretend like he was our friend.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. We absolutely cannot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a horrible thought. If we move him, will the dragon know we were here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Was he on one of those stakes?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that if they knew, he would be in a more exalted position of defacement. I think this is just slaughter. Things vanish. I'm all right with making this vanish. That's as much of a calling card as I feel we need to leave.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where should we bring him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: His home doesn't really exist anymore.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: His home was with us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Back to Emon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have a thought.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To our keep. It was very important to him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is his place.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're not bringing him to us. We're leaving him here, but we're putting him somewhere appropriate.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We'd take him away. Can you melt ice and snow, and we'll lay him here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Put him with the books.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He always loved them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For now, anyway. And then when we free this place, we can find a proper tomb for him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We take him back to where the frozen books lay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find the remnants of the library. As you find a section of the stone rubble that's loose enough, you pull it open, and there beneath, you can see there are hundreds and hundreds of books, many still pristine, if a little soggy from the melted snow. You gather a lot of time was spent in this library in his youth, and it's probably as good a place as any to leave his memory for the time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are any of the Ravenites around us, or are we alone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're keeping their distance, but they're watching. You get the sense that they understand what's going on, but they're not taking any offense to it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This will do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I start pulling books out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I start melting ice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is Lockheed still on my shoulder?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lockheed is still on your shoulder.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I bring him down so he can say goodbye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see the tattered robes that show a fierce battle was fought. Regardless of this condition of finding him, knowing him as well as you did, he still probably left a hero. As you lay him down on the books, mostly thawed now, Lockheed finds a moment of recognition and immediately flutters onto his chest and curls up, mews a bit, nibbles at the chin.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to sit three or four feet away from him, facing him, and start privately thanking the Raven Queen for ushering him on.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to take a chalice out of the bag of holding, and I begin to fill it with ale, and then remember he preferred water, and I take the alchemy jug and I pour fresh water into the chalice and lay it with him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I take and I rip off a piece of his robes. Tuck it away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you seal it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys step back, the nearby stone clatters to life.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I get Lockheed out of there. I don't want him to stay in. Do you want to come?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lockheed resists and resists and doesn't want to leave.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In Draconic I say: It's all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lockheed curls up onto his face and nibbles a bit on the forehead, then turns back and flutters up onto your shoulder. The stonework clatters closed over the top of the rubble of the library.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth drops to her knees and starts crying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax. In this moment of sadness, there is a bit of warmth, as you sense, though remote as it is through the Divine Gate, the Raven Queen's assurance that his spirit has made it to the other side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I put my hand on Keyleth's shoulder. He loved you well, princess.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He was so stupid.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He meant well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to find Tooma. Is she behind us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He should have never left our side.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But there's our promise. That's the best you're going to get. I head out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I follow Percy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll come back and we'll fix this. Because this is... poppycock.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you gather yourselves up, here amongst the ruins of Draconia, the last of the sky's light, the sun has faded and the night has taken its form. You hear the distant caws of the evening birds as they begin to take to the skies above the ravine. Tooma and the rest of the Ravenites give a nod as you join hands. Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go home.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, let's. There's much to do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Back to Whitestone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Were you going to leave a tree?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We let them know where the grove would be found, before we left them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do Plant Growth. Make a big old tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Where do you create the tree?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wherever we decided it was best to create the tree.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Outside of the ravine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At the top. A little grove of trees.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which, with a simple use of the broom or wild shape, you can make your way up there, find a small patch of bushes, create a single tree that didn't exist there previously, a small sapling now grown to full height. The bastion of a promise to be kept. Keyleth returns. You take hands. You step through the nearest tree as the portal opens, and find yourself emerging from the other side of the Sun Tree, back in Whitestone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I give the Sun Tree a little pat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The morning sun begins to rise.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll report what we've seen in the new room. No one else. And we will never utter this city's name outside these walls again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Totally. Dick move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find yourselves to rest, keeping memories fresh untill sleep takes you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Knock on Vax's door.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As everyone else is going to rest, Keyleth, you find your way to Vax's door.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I stay with you tonight?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't fuck anything up with words, and I open the door.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not going to fuck it up by saying anything. I open the door.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just go in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with that we'll pick up next week on Thursday.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Glad we decided to take a light-hearted game.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a fun romp after the Feywild, a fun romp.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bar hop! Bar crawl!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I need a stiff drink.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I was simultaneously looking forward to and not looking forward to the return to Draconia for that reason.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll pick it up next week, guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sorry. Sorry, guys. Sorry to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks, Loot Crate.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: $3 discount.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pour one out for Tibs. We will be.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not all narrative is bright, but it has its purpose.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll be back next Thursday to see the next length of Vox Machina's journey. Is it Thursday yet? Good night.
